# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147.2 ::date 2013-06-07T13:30:56 ::snt-type country ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

(c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Singapore"))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147.3 ::date 2013-06-08T06:31:29 ::snt-type topic ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Crime; narcotics
# ::save-date Thu Jun 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147_3.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (c / crime)
      :op2 (n / narcotic))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147.4 ::date 2013-06-08T06:43:30 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt An Australian man was charged in Singapore with drug trafficking.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147_4.txt
(c / charge-05
      :ARG1 (m / man
            :mod (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Australia")))
      :ARG2 (t / traffic-00
            :ARG1 (d / drug))
      :location (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Singapore")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147.5 ::date 2013-06-08T06:48:05 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Singapore's Central Narcotics Bureau said on 070116 in a statement that Australian Michael Karras was arrested on 070109 after being found in possession of 495 grams of cannabis.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147_5.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (g / government-organization
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Central"
                  :op2 "Narcotics"
                  :op3 "Bureau")
          :poss (c / country
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "Singapore")))
  :ARG1 (a / arrest-01
          :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :name (n4 / name
                          :op1 "Michael"
                          :op2 "Karras")
                  :mod (c3 / country
                         :name (n5 / name
                                 :op1 "Australia")))
          :ARG2 (f / find-01
                  :ARG1 (p / possess-01
                          :ARG0 p2
                          :ARG1 (c4 / cannabis
                                  :quant (m2 / mass-quantity
                                           :quant 495
                                           :unit (g4 / gram)))))
          :time (d / date-entity
                  :day 9
                  :month 1
                  :year 2007))
  :time (d3 / date-entity
          :day 16
          :month 1
          :year 2007))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147.6 ::date 2013-06-11T09:25:24 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The statement said Karras was subsequently charged for the offence of trafficking in a controlled drug.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147_6.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG1 (c / charge-05
          :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                          :op1 "Karras"))
          :ARG2 (o / offence
                  :mod (t / traffic-00
                         :ARG1 (d2 / drug
                                 :ARG1-of (c3 / control-01))))
          :time (s2 / subsequent)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147.7 ::date 2013-06-11T09:52:17 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Karras faces at least 5 years' imprisonment and a minimum 5 strokes of the cane if convicted but would escape the death penalty sentence mandatory for anyone caught trafficking more than 500 grams of cannabis.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147_7.txt
(c / contrast-01
  :ARG1 (f / face-01
          :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                          :op1 "Karras"))
          :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (i / imprison-01
                         :ARG1 p
                         :ARG2 (a2 / at-least
                                 :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                                        :quant 5
                                        :unit (y / year))))
                  :op2 (s / strike-01
                         :ARG2 (c3 / cane)
                         :quant (m / minimum
                                  :op1 5))
                  :condition (c2 / convict-01
                               :ARG1 p)))
  :ARG2 (e / escape-01
          :ARG0 p
          :ARG1 (p4 / penalize-01
                  :instrument (d / die-01)
                  :mod (m2 / mandatory
                         :prep-for (a3 / anyone
                                     :ARG1-of (c4 / catch-02
                                                :ARG2 (t2 / traffic-00
                                                        :ARG1 (c5 / cannabis
                                                                :quant (m4 / more-than
                                                                         :op1 (m5 / mass-quantity
                                                                                :quant 500
                                                                                :unit (g2 / gram)))))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147.8 ::date 2013-06-11T11:07:12 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The arrest of Karras comes more than a year after the highly publicized hanging of Australian Nguyen Tuong van.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147_8.txt
(b / be-temporally-at-91
  :ARG1 (a / arrest-01
          :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                          :op1 "Karras")))
  :ARG2 (a3 / after
          :op1 (p4 / publicize-01
                 :ARG1 (h4 / hang-01
                         :ARG1 (p5 / person
                                 :name (n4 / name
                                         :op1 "Nguyen"
                                         :op2 "Tuong"
                                         :op3 "Van")
                                 :mod (c3 / country
                                        :name (n5 / name
                                                :op1 "Australia"))))
                 :degree (h3 / high))
          :quant (m / more-than
                   :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                          :quant 1
                          :unit (y / year)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147.9 ::date 2013-06-11T11:51:11 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Nguyen was executed in 051200 for trying to smuggle 400 grams of heroin via Singapore to Australia in 020000.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147_9.txt
(e / execute-01
  :ARG1 (p2 / person
          :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "Nguyen"))
  :time (d3 / date-entity
          :month 12
          :year 2005)
  :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
             :ARG0 (t / try-01
                     :ARG0 p2
                     :ARG1 (s / smuggle-01
                             :ARG1 (h / heroin
                                     :quant (m / mass-quantity
                                              :quant 400
                                              :unit (g / gram)))
                             :ARG3 (c4 / country
                                     :name (n6 / name
                                             :op1 "Australia"))
                             :path (c3 / country
                                     :name (n5 / name
                                             :op1 "Singapore"))
                             :time (d / date-entity
                                     :year 2002)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147.10 ::date 2013-06-11T15:07:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Nguyen's hanging despite heavy lobbying from the Australian government for Singapore to show clemency triggered public outrage in Australia where capital punishment is outlawed.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147_10.txt
(t / trigger-02
  :ARG0 (h / hang-01
          :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :name (n5 / name
                          :op1 "Nguyen"))
          :concession (l / lobby-01
                        :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                                :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                           :ARG1 c7))
                        :ARG1 (s / show-01
                                :ARG1 (c6 / clemency))
                        :ARG2 (c5 / country
                                :name (n7 / name
                                        :op1 "Singapore"))
                        :manner (h2 / heavy)))
  :ARG1 (o / outrage-01
          :ARG1 (p3 / public)
          :location (c7 / country
                      :name (n8 / name
                              :op1 "Australia")
                      :location-of (o3 / outlaw-01
                                     :ARG1 (p4 / punish-01
                                             :mod (c2 / capital))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147.11 ::date 2013-06-16T09:28:27 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Singapore also applies the death sentence to other crimes including murder, treason, kidnapping and firearms offences.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0147_11.txt
(a / apply-02
  :ARG0 (c / country
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Singapore"))
  :ARG1 (s / sentence-01
          :ARG2 (d / die-01))
  :ARG2 (c2 / crime
          :mod (o / other)
          :ARG2-of (i / include-01
                     :ARG1 (a4 / and
                             :op1 (m / murder-01)
                             :op2 (b / betray-01)
                             :op3 (k / kidnap-01)
                             :op4 (o3 / offence
                                    :instrument (f / firearm)))))
  :mod (a2 / also))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270.4 ::date 2013-06-16T10:44:28 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Israeli Foreign Minister Visits South Korea to discuss connection between North Korea and Iran's nuclear programs and enforcement of UN resolution on Hezbollah.
# ::save-date Sat Sep 14, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270_4.txt
(v / visit-01
  :ARG0 (p2 / person
          :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                     :ARG1 (c4 / country
                             :name (n6 / name
                                     :op1 "Israel"))
                     :ARG2 (m / minister
                             :mod (f / foreign))))
  :ARG1 (c6 / country
          :name (n9 / name
                  :op1 "South"
                  :op2 "Korea"))
  :purpose (d / discuss-01
             :ARG0 p2
             :ARG1 (c / connect-01
                     :ARG1 (a / and
                             :op1 (p3 / program
                                    :poss (a2 / and
                                            :op1 (c5 / country
                                                   :name (n7 / name
                                                           :op1 "North"
                                                           :op2 "Korea"))
                                            :op2 (c7 / country
                                                   :name (n10 / name
                                                           :op1 "Iran")))
                                    :mod (n / nucleus))
                             :op2 (e2 / enforce-01
                                    :ARG1 (r / resolution
                                            :mod (o2 / organization
                                                   :name (n8 / name
                                                           :op1 "UN"))
                                            :topic (p / political-party
                                                     :name (n5 / name
                                                             :op1 "Hezbollah"))))))
             :ARG2 c6))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270.6 ::date 2013-06-16T11:11:54 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270_6.txt
(s / share-01
  :ARG0 (a / and
          :op1 (c / country
                 :name (n / name
                         :op1 "Israel"))
          :op2 (c2 / country
                 :name (n2 / name
                         :op1 "South"
                         :op2 "Korea")))
  :ARG1 (c3 / concern-01
          :ARG0 (c5 / connect-01
                  :ARG1 (a4 / and
                          :op1 (c9 / country
                                 :name (n3 / name
                                         :op1 "North"
                                         :op2 "Korea"))
                          :op2 (c10 / country
                                 :name (n4 / name
                                         :op1 "Iran")))
                  :purpose (p / pursue-01
                             :ARG0 a4
                             :ARG1 (w2 / weapon
                                     :ARG2-of (d2 / destroy-01
                                                :degree (m2 / mass)))))
          :ARG1 a))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270.7 ::date 2013-06-16T12:04:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt South Korea and Israel oppose proliferation of weapons of mass destruction and an arms race.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270_7.txt
(o / oppose-01
  :ARG0 (a2 / and
          :op1 (c / country
                 :name (n / name
                         :op1 "Israel"))
          :op2 (c2 / country
                 :name (n2 / name
                         :op1 "South"
                         :op2 "Korea")))
  :ARG1 (a3 / and
          :op1 (p / proliferate-01
                 :ARG0 (w2 / weapon
                         :ARG2-of (d2 / destroy-01
                                    :degree (m2 / mass))))
          :op2 (r / race-02
                 :ARG2 (a / arm))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270.8 ::date 2013-06-16T12:07:25 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Livni visited Seoul 20070115-20070116 to discuss enhancement of bilateral relations with South Korean Prime Minister Han Myeong-sook and Foreign Minister Song Min-soon.
# ::save-date Sat Sep 14, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270_8.txt
(v / visit-01
  :ARG0 (p4 / person
          :name (n5 / name
                  :op1 "Livni"))
  :ARG1 (c3 / city
          :name (n6 / name
                  :op1 "Seoul"))
  :time (d2 / date-interval
          :op1 (d3 / date-entity
                 :day 15
                 :month 1
                 :year 2007)
          :op2 (d5 / date-entity
                 :day 16
                 :month 1
                 :year 2007))
  :purpose (d / discuss-01
             :ARG0 p4
             :ARG1 (e / enhance-01
                     :ARG1 (r / relation
                             :mod (b / bilateral)))
             :ARG2 (a / and
                     :op1 (p / person
                            :name (n8 / name
                                    :op1 "Han"
                                    :op2 "Myeong-sook")
                            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                       :ARG1 (c2 / country
                                               :name (n7 / name
                                                       :op1 "South"
                                                       :op2 "Korea"))
                                       :ARG2 (m / minister
                                               :mod (p2 / prime))))
                     :op2 (p3 / person
                            :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Song"
                                    :op2 "Min-soon")
                            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                       :ARG1 c2
                                       :ARG2 (m2 / minister
                                               :mod (f2 / foreign)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270.9 ::date 2013-06-16T12:08:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Livni is the first Israeli foreign minister to visit Seoul since relations between Israel and South Korea began in 1962.
# ::save-date Sat Sep 14, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270_9.txt
(p2 / person
  :name (n6 / name
          :op1 "Livni")
  :ord (o / ordinal-entity
         :value 1)
  :ARG0-of (v2 / visit-01
             :ARG1 (c5 / city
                     :name (n7 / name
                             :op1 "Seoul"))
             :time (s / since
                     :op1 (b / begin-01
                            :ARG1 (r / relation
                                    :mod (b2 / between
                                           :op1 c6
                                           :op2 (c2 / country
                                                  :name (n2 / name
                                                          :op1 "South"
                                                          :op2 "Korea"))))
                            :time (d / date-entity
                                    :year 1962))))
  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
             :ARG1 (c6 / country
                     :name (n8 / name
                             :op1 "Israel"))
             :ARG2 (m / minister
                     :mod (f3 / foreign))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270.12 ::date 2013-06-17T15:04:32 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Israel supports South Korea's plan to send 350 troops as part of UN peacekeeping forces to Lebanon later in 2007.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270_12.txt
(s / support-01
  :ARG0 (c4 / country
          :name (n5 / name
                  :op1 "Israel"))
  :ARG1 (p / plan-01
          :ARG0 (c5 / country
                  :name (n6 / name
                          :op1 "South"
                          :op2 "Korea"))
          :ARG1 (s2 / send-01
                  :ARG0 c5
                  :ARG1 (t2 / troop
                          :quant 350
                          :part-of (f / force
                                     :poss (o2 / organization
                                             :name (n2 / name
                                                     :op1 "UN"))
                                     :ARG0-of (k2 / keep-01
                                                :ARG1 (p3 / peace))))
                  :ARG2 (c / country
                          :name (n / name
                                  :op1 "Lebanon")))
          :time (l / late
                  :op1 (d / date-entity
                         :year 2007)
                  :degree (m / more))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270.13 ::date 2013-06-17T15:10:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The UN arms embargo on Hezbollah remains unenforced because the open Syria-Lebanon border is being used to transfer weapons to Hezbollah.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270_13.txt
(r / remain-01
  :ARG1 (e / embargo-01
          :ARG0 (o2 / organization
                  :name (n6 / name
                          :op1 "UN"))
          :ARG1 (a / arm)
          :beneficiary (p3 / political-party
                         :name (n / name
                                 :op1 "Hezbollah")))
  :ARG3 (e2 / enforce-01
          :polarity -)
  :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
             :ARG0 (u2 / use-01
                     :ARG1 (l / location
                             :location-of (b2 / border-01
                                            :ARG1 (c4 / country
                                                    :name (n4 / name
                                                            :op1 "Syria"))
                                            :ARG2 (c5 / country
                                                    :name (n5 / name
                                                            :op1 "Lebanon")))
                             :mod (o / open))
                     :ARG2 (t / transfer-01
                             :ARG1 (w / weapon)
                             :ARG2 p3))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270.14 ::date 2013-06-17T15:17:13 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt UN Security Council Resolution 1701 ended the 34 day conflict between Israel and Hezbollah in 2006.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270_14.txt
(e / end-01
      :ARG1 (c3 / conflict-01
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Israel"))
            :ARG1 (p / political-party :name (n2 / name :op1 "Hezbollah"))
            :duration (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 34
                  :unit (d / day)))
      :ARG2 (l / law :name (n3 / name :op1 "UN" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Council" :op4 "Resolution" :op5 "1701"))
      :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2006))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270.15 ::date 2013-06-17T15:21:51 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The resolution demands a full arms embargo on Hezbollah in Lebanon and the removal of Hezbollah as a fighting force from southern Lebanon.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270_15.txt
(d / demand-01
      :ARG0 (r / resolution)
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (e / embargo-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / arm)
                  :beneficiary (p / political-party :name (n / name :op1 "Hezbollah")
                        :location (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Lebanon")))
                  :mod (f / full))
            :op2 (r2 / remove-01
                  :ARG1 p
                  :ARG2 (s / south
                        :part-of c)
                  :prep-as (f2 / force
                        :ARG0-of (f3 / fight-01)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270.16 ::date 2013-06-17T15:26:05 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The US accuses Iran of seeking a nuclear weapon.
# ::save-date Mon Jun 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270_16.txt
(a / accuse-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "US"))
      :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
      :ARG2 (s / seek-01
            :ARG0 c2
            :ARG1 (w / weapon
                  :mod (n3 / nucleus))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270.17 ::date 2013-06-17T15:27:19 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Iran insists that nuclear program exclusively develops nuclear energy for the growing Iranian population.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270_17.txt
(i / insist-01
  :ARG0 (c / country
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Iran"))
  :ARG1 (d / develop-02
          :ARG0 (p / program
                  :mod (n2 / nucleus))
          :ARG1 (e2 / energy
                  :mod n2)
          :ARG3 (p2 / population
                  :mod c
                  :ARG1-of (g2 / grow-01))
          :mod (e / exclusive)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270.18 ::date 2013-06-17T15:30:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 20061009 North Korea conducted its first nuclear test.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070116_0270_18.txt
(t2 / test-01
  :ARG0 (c / country
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "North"
                  :op2 "Korea"))
  :mod (n3 / nucleus)
  :time (d2 / date-entity
          :day 9
          :month 10
          :year 2006)
  :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070125_0080.4 ::date 2013-06-02T03:41:55 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt A Taiwanese drug trafficker named Tsai Wen-Huang was arrested in the Philippines on January 25, 2007 after fleeing from a conviction for selling Ketamine ..
# ::save-date Sun Jun 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070125_0080_4.txt
(a / arrest-01
      :ARG1 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Tsai" :op2 "Wen-Huang")
            :ARG0-of (t / traffic-00
                  :ARG1 (d / drug))
            :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Taiwan")))
      :location (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Philippines"))
      :time (d2 / date-entity :day 25 :month 1 :year 2007)
      :time (a2 / after
            :op1 (f / flee-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (c3 / convict-01
                        :ARG1 p
                        :ARG2 (s / sell-01
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (k / ketamine))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070125_0080.5 ::date 2013-06-02T04:35:58 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Police stated on January 25, 2007 that a fugitive Taiwanese drug trafficker named Tsai Wen-Huang has been arrested in the southern Philippines.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070125_0080_5.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / police)
      :ARG1 (a / arrest-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (p2 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Tsai" :op2 "Wen-Huang")
                  :ARG0-of (t / traffic-00
                        :ARG1 (d2 / drug))
                  :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Taiwan"))
                  :ARG0-of (f / flee-01))
            :location (s2 / south
                  :part-of (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Philippines"))))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 25 :month 1 :year 2007))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070125_0080.6 ::date 2013-06-02T05:40:38 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Tsai Wen-Huang had been a fugitive since 2001 when he was convicted for selling Ketamine.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070125_0080_6.txt
(f / flee-01
  :ARG0 (p / person
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Tsai"
                  :op2 "Wen-Huang"))
  :duration (s / since
              :op1 (d / date-entity
                     :year 2001
                     :time-of (c / convict-01
                                :ARG1 p
                                :ARG2 (s2 / sell-01
                                        :ARG0 p
                                        :ARG1 (k / ketamine))))))

            :location (i / island :name (n2 / name :op1 "Mindanao"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070125_0080.8 ::date 2013-06-02T06:07:57 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (f / flee-01

            :purpose (w / work-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG3 (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of (t / traffic-00)
                        :mod (l / local)))
            :time (f2 / flee-01
                  :ARG0 p2)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070125_0080.9 ::date 2013-06-02T06:24:25 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

  :ARG0 (p / police)
  :ARG1 (a / and
          :op1 (b / buy-01
                 :ARG0 (p2 / person
                         :name (n / name
                                 :op1 "Tsai"
                                 :op2 "Wen-Huang"))
                 :ARG1 (k / ketamine)
                 :mod (l / local))
          :op2 (e / export-01
                 :ARG0 p2
                 :ARG1 k
                 :ARG2 (c / country
                         :name (n3 / name
                                 :op1 "Taiwan"))
                 :manner (m / mark-04
                           :ARG1 k)))
  :mod (a2 / also))

                                                        :mod (m2 / methamphetamine)))))
                     :degree (l / large))
          :domain (k / ketamine)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070201_0099.8 ::date 2013-06-02T11:02:48 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt China's Foreign Ministry refused to react directly to Abe's comments that Beijing had violated an International Space Treaty when it shot down one of its own satellites with a missile on January 11, 2007.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070201_0099_8.txt
(r / refuse-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "Foreign" :op2 "Ministry")
            :mod (c / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "China")))
      :ARG1 (r2 / react-01
            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 (c2 / comment-02
                  :ARG0 (p / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Abe"))
                  :ARG1 (v / violate-01
                        :ARG0 (c3 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Beijing"))
                        :ARG1 (t / treaty
                              :topic (s4 / space)
                              :mod (i4 / international))
                        :time (s / shoot-05
                              :ARG0 c3
                              :ARG1 (s2 / satellite :quant 1
                                    :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                                          :ARG2 (s3 / satellite
                                                :poss c3)))
                              :ARG2 (m2 / missile)
                              :time (d2 / date-entity :day 11 :month 1 :year 2007))))
            :manner (d / direct)))

                        :mod (b2 / base)

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070201_0099.14 ::date 2013-06-02T16:00:33 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The 1967 UN treaty bans weapons of mass destruction in space and said that all nations should avoid contamination of space and be held liable for any damage caused.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070201_0099_14.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (b / ban-01
         :ARG0 (t / treaty
                 :time (d / date-entity
                         :year 1967)
                 :mod (o / organization
                        :name (n / name
                                :op1 "UN")))
         :ARG1 (w / weapon
                 :location (s / space)
                 :ARG2-of (d2 / destroy-01
                            :degree (m / mass))))
  :op2 (s2 / say-01
         :ARG0 t
         :ARG1 (r / recommend-01
                 :ARG1 (a6 / and
                         :op1 (a3 / avoid-01
                                :ARG0 (n2 / nation
                                        :quant (a4 / all))
                                :ARG1 (c / contaminate-01
                                        :ARG1 s))
                         :op2 (h / hold-02
                                :ARG1 (l / liable-41
                                        :ARG1 n2
                                        :ARG2 (d3 / damage-01
                                                :mod (a5 / any)
                                                :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                                                           :ARG0 n2))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070201_0099.20 ::date 2013-06-02T22:38:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The United States and the then Soviet Union are the only other nations to have carried similar tests.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070201_0099_20.txt
(n / nation
  :domain (a / and
            :op1 (c / country
                   :name (n2 / name
                           :op1 "United"
                           :op2 "States"))
            :op2 (c2 / country
                   :name (n3 / name
                           :op1 "Soviet"
                           :op2 "Union")
                   :time (t2 / then)))
  :mod (o / other)
  :mod (o2 / only)
  :ARG0-of (t / test-01
             :ARG1-of (r / resemble-01)))

                                          :mod n2))))))
      :time (d2 / date-entity :month 11 :year 2006))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070208_0432.7 ::date 2013-06-02T03:17:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu Jul 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070208_0432_7.txt

          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "EU"))

          :ARG1 (e / enter-01
                  :ARG0 (i2 / individual
                          :ARG0-of (a2 / aid-01

                                                      :op1 (w / weapon
                                                             :mod (n3 / nucleus))
                                                      :op2 (w2 / weapon
                                                             :mod (o2 / other)

                                             :poss (c / country

                                                             :op1 "North"
                                                             :op2 "Korea")))
                                     :ARG1-of (d / deem-01)))
                  :ARG1 o))
  :mod (a / also))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070208_0432.8 ::date 2013-06-02T03:26:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :mod (t2 / thing

                        :mod (l / law))))

                  :op1 (a2 / authority)
                  :op2 (b / bank)
                  :op3 (b2 / body
                        :mod (o / other))
                  :source (s2 / state
                        :mod (e / each)
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG2 (m / member)))

                        :ARG1 (c / comply-01

            :op1 (a5 / apply-02
                  :ARG1 (m2 / measure))))

                             :mod (l / less
                                    :degree (m / more)))))
  :location (p3 / public-institution
              :name (n2 / name
                      :op1 "Old"
                      :op2 "Bailey"))
  :instrument (l2 / link
                :mod (v / video))
  :source (p2 / prison))

# ::save-date Fri Jul 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070223_0217_17.txt

          :mod (s / strict)

                  :mod (c2 / court))
          :location (c3 / country
                      :name (n / name
                              :op1 "United"
                              :op2 "Kingdom")))

          :ARG0 (m2 / media)
          :ARG1 (d / detail
                  :topic (c4 / case
                           :prep-against (d2 / defendant)))
          :time (b / before
                  :op1 (t / try-02
                         :mod (a / any))))
  :purpose (p2 / prevent-01
             :ARG1 (r2 / risk-01
                     :ARG1 (p3 / prejudice-01
                             :ARG1 (j / jury
                                     :ARG0-of (h / hear-01
                                                :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                                                        :ARG0-of (e / evidence-01))))
                             :mod (s2 / serious)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070227_0060.18 ::date 2013-06-04T05:41:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt After the months of diplomacy and during six-nation talks in Beijing in 070200 North Korea agreed to dismantle North Korea's nuclear program in return for economic aid and diplomatic benefits.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070227_0060_18.txt
(a / agree-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))
      :ARG1 (d / dismantle-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (p / program
                  :mod (n2 / nucleus)
                  :poss c)
            :ARG1-of (e2 / exchange-01
                  :ARG3 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (a3 / aid-01
                              :ARG2 c
                              :mod (e / economy))
                        :op2 (b / benefit-01
                              :ARG1 c
                              :mod (d2 / diplomacy)))))
      :time (a4 / after
            :op1 (d5 / diplomacy
                  :duration (m / multiple
                        :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                              :unit (m2 / month)))))
      :time (t / talk-01
            :ARG0 (n3 / nation :quant 6)

                        :mod (n4 / nucleus))

                 :name (n2 / name
                         :op1 "Iran"))

                 :name (n3 / name
                         :op1 "North"

                  :op1 "Kadhafi"))

                 :prep-with (c2 / country
                              :name (n4 / name
                                      :op1 "Britain")))

                 :prep-with (c3 / country
                              :name (n5 / name
                                      :op1 "France")))

                 :prep-with (c4 / country
                              :name (n6 / name
                                      :op1 "US")))

                  :name (n3 / name
                          :op1 "Libya")))

          :year 2003)

                :ARG0 p
                :ARG2 (a2 / abandon-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (a3 / attempt-01
                                :ARG0 p
                                :ARG1 (d2 / develop-02
                                        :ARG0 p

                                                :op1 (w / weapon
                                                       :mod (n7 / nucleus))

                                                                  :degree (m / mass))
                                                       :mod (o / other))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070305_0181.5 ::date 2013-06-04T06:53:10 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                              :mod (n4 / new)))

                        :ARG0 t

                  :op1 (f3 / foil-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / plot
                              :quant (s / some)))
                  :op2 (j / jail-01
                        :ARG1 (m3 / militant))))

            :ARG0 p4
            :time (c2 / conference
                  :location (c4 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Jakarta"))
                  :ARG0-of (c6 / counter-01
                        :ARG1 (t2 / terrorism)))
            :ARG0-of (o / open-02)))

                               :mod (t4 / terrorism)))))

                        :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                              :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))

                              :ARG0 g

            :ARG2 (s2 / stop-01

                  :ARG0-of (c2 / compromise-02
                        :ARG1 (p / principle
                              :mod (d / democracy))))))

          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Wirajuda"))

          :ARG2 (s2 / stop-01

                                               :op1 (v2 / violate-01

                                               :op2 (d4 / disregard-01

                                    :unit (d3 / dollar)))))

                  :degree (w / wide)))

                              :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91

                  :ARG0 p6
                  :ARG1 (p3 / plan-01
                        :ARG1 (p4 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Blair"))))))

                                              :ARG0-of (b / broaden-01
                                                         :ARG1 (t4 / thing
                                                                 :ARG2-of (s / sanction-02
                                                                            :ARG0 (o2 / organization
                                                                                    :name (n2 / name
                                                                                            :op1 "UN"))
                                                                            :ARG1 (c2 / country
                                                                                    :name (n3 / name
                                                                                            :op1 "Iran")))))))))
          :manner (f / frantic))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :year 2007
          :month 3
          :day 23))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070323_0461.7 ::date 2013-06-06T12:07:18 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :ARG1-of (c / close-01)))

            :ARG0 p2

                  :ARG0-of (f / finish-01))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070326_0201.7 ::date 2013-06-06T16:17:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070326_0201.10 ::date 2013-06-06T16:38:04 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The resolution was passed unanimously on 070324 after days of hard bargaining by the Security Council's 15 members.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070326_0201_10.txt
(p / pass-01
      :ARG1 (r / resolution)
      :mod (u / unanimous)
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2007 :month 3 :day 24)
      :time (a / after
            :op1 (b / bargain-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person :quant 15
                        :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Security" :op2 "Council"))
                              :ARG2 (m / member)))
                  :manner (h / hard)
                  :duration (m3 / multiple
                        :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                              :unit (d2 / day))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070326_0201.12 ::date 2013-06-06T16:48:01 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The sanctions block all Iranian arms exports and freeze the overseas assets of 28 additional officials and institutions linked to Iran's nuclear and ballistic missile programs and restrict financial aid or loans to the Iranian government while setting a new 60-day deadline for the Iranian government to comply with UN demands or face further appropriate measures.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070326_0201_12.txt
(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (b / block-01
                  :ARG0 (s / sanction-02)
                  :ARG1 (e / export-01
                        :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))
                        :ARG1 (a2 / arm)
                        :quant (a6 / all)))
            :op2 (f / freeze-02
                  :ARG0 s
                  :ARG1 (a3 / asset
                        :location (o / overseas)
                        :poss (a4 / and :quant 28
                              :op1 (p3 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG2 (o2 / official)))
                              :op2 (i / institution)
                              :mod (a5 / additional)
                              :ARG1-of (l / link-01
                                    :ARG1 (a9 / and
                                          :op1 (p / program
                                                :mod (n2 / nucleus))
                                          :op2 (p2 / program
                                                :topic (m / missile
                                                      :mod (b2 / ballistics)))
                                          :poss c2)))))
            :op3 (r / restrict-01
                  :ARG0 s
                  :ARG1 (o3 / or
                        :op1 (a7 / aid-01
                              :ARG2 (g / government-organization
                                    :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                          :ARG1 c2))
                              :mod (f2 / finance))
                        :op2 (l2 / loan-01
                              :ARG2 g)))
            :op4 (s2 / set-02
                  :ARG0 s
                  :ARG1 (d / deadline
                        :mod (t / temporal-quantity :quant 60
                              :unit (d2 / day))
                        :time-of (o4 / or
                              :op1 (c3 / comply-01
                                    :ARG0 g
                                    :ARG1 (d3 / demand-01
                                          :ARG0 (o5 / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "UN"))))
                              :op2 (f3 / face-01
                                    :ARG0 g
                                    :ARG1 (m2 / measure
                                          :mod (a8 / appropriate)
                                          :mod (f4 / further))))
                        :mod (n4 / new)))))

                                          :ARG0 g)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070327_0167.7 ::date 2013-06-10T13:24:33 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The resolution was passed after North Korea announced a nuclear test.
# ::save-date Mon Jun 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070327_0167_7.txt
(p / pass-01
      :ARG1 (r2 / resolution)
      :time (a / after
            :op1 (a2 / announce-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))
                  :ARG1 (t2 / test-01
                        :mod (n2 / nucleus)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070327_0167.8 ::date 2013-06-10T03:58:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The sanctions include a ban on the sale or export of all materials that could be used in North Korea's nuclear and ballistic missile programs or in the manufacture of weapons of mass destruction.
# ::save-date Fri Jul 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070327_0167_8.txt
(i / include-01
  :ARG1 (b / ban-01
          :ARG1 (o / or
                  :op1 (s2 / sell-01
                         :ARG1 (m / material
                                 :quant (a / all)
                                 :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                                            :ARG2 (o2 / or
                                                    :op1 (a2 / and
                                                           :op1 (p2 / program
                                                                  :ARG0-of (c2 / concern-02
                                                                             :ARG1 (m2 / missile
                                                                                     :mod (n2 / nucleus))))
                                                           :op2 (p3 / program
                                                                  :ARG0-of (c3 / concern-02
                                                                             :ARG1 (m5 / missile
                                                                                     :mod (b3 / ballistics))))
                                                           :poss (c / country
                                                                   :name (n / name
                                                                           :op1 "North"
                                                                           :op2 "Korea")))
                                                    :op2 (m3 / manufacture-01
                                                           :ARG1 (w / weapon
                                                                   :ARG2-of (d / destroy-01
                                                                              :degree (m4 / mass)))))
                                            :mod (p / possible))))
                  :op2 (e / export-01
                         :ARG1 m)))
  :ARG2 (t / thing
          :ARG2-of (s / sanction-02)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070327_0167.9 ::date 2013-06-10T13:27:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The EU froze the assets abroad of some North Korean officials.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 12, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070327_0167_9.txt
(f / freeze-02
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "EU"))
      :ARG1 (a / asset
            :location (a2 / abroad)
            :poss (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))
                        :ARG2 (o2 / official))
                  :quant (s / some))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070327_0167.10 ::date 2013-06-10T13:09:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The EU banned exports to the country of luxury goods like caviar, truffles, high-quality wines and perfumes and pure bred horses.
# ::save-date Mon Jun 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070327_0167_10.txt
(b / ban-01
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "EU"))
      :ARG1 (e / export-01
            :ARG1 (g / good
                  :mod (l / luxury)
                  :example (a / and
                        :op1 (c2 / caviar)
                        :op2 (t / truffle)
                        :op3 (w / wine
                              :mod (q / quality
                                    :mod (h / high)))
                        :op4 (p / perfume
                              :mod q)
                        :op5 (h2 / horse
                              :ARG1-of (b2 / breed-01
                                    :mod (p2 / pure)))))
            :ARG2 (c / country)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070327_0167.11 ::date 2013-06-10T13:31:05 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070327_0167_11.txt
(s / support-01
      :ARG0 (b / bloc)
      :ARG1 (l / law :name (n / name :op1 "UN" :op2 "resolution" :op3 "1718"))
      :time (d2 / date-entity :month 11))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070327_0167.12 ::date 2013-06-10T14:31:03 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The application of sanctions required a formal EU decision.
# ::save-date Mon Jun 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070327_0167_12.txt
(r / require-01
      :ARG0 (a / apply-02
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG2-of (s / sanction-02)))
      :ARG1 (t2 / thing
            :ARG1-of (d / decide-01
                  :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "EU")))
            :mod (f / formal)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070327_0167.13 ::date 2013-06-10T03:50:27 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The decision was delayed by an argument between Britain and Spain concerning the method in which Gibraltar would implement the measures.
# ::save-date Mon Jun 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070327_0167_13.txt
(d / delay-01
      :ARG0 (a / argue-02
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Britain"))
            :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Spain"))
            :ARG2 (m / method
                  :instrument-of (i / implement-01
                        :ARG0 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Gibraltar"))
                        :ARG1 (m2 / measure))))
      :ARG1 (d2 / decide-01))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070327_0167.14 ::date 2013-06-10T03:42:24 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The resolution was passed after the North Korean government announced that it had performed its first nuclear weapons test on October 9, 2006.
# ::save-date Mon Jun 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070327_0167_14.txt
(p / pass-01
      :ARG1 (r2 / resolution)
      :time (a / after
            :op1 (a2 / announce-01
                  :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))))
                  :ARG1 (t2 / test-01
                        :ARG0 g
                        :ARG1 (w / weapon
                              :mod (n2 / nucleus))
                        :time (d / date-entity :day 9 :month 10 :year 2006)
                        :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1)))))

            :mod (w / world-wide)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070331_0467.4 ::date 2013-06-10T14:43:06 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (t / traffic-00
            :ARG1 (a / arm
                  :mod (l / law :polarity -)))
      :location (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Kenya"))
      :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (a3 / available
                        :mod (e / easy))
                  :op2 (c3 / conflict-01
                        :ARG1-of (n2 / neighbor-01)))))

                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))
            :ARG1 (d / disarm-01
                  :ARG0 g)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070331_0467.7 ::date 2013-06-10T03:12:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Daniel kiptugen of Oxfam stated that there are approximately 140,000 illegal arms in circulation in Kenya among the most vulnerable and marginalized groups.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070331_0467_7.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Daniel" :op2 "Kiptugen")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Oxfam"))))
      :ARG1 (c / circulate-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / arm
                  :mod (l / law :polarity -)
                  :quant (a3 / approximately :op1 140000))
            :location (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Kenya"))
            :beneficiary (g / group
                  :mod (v / vulnerable
                        :degree (m2 / most))
                  :ARG1-of (m / marginalize-01
                        :degree (m3 / most)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070331_0467.8 ::date 2013-06-10T02:49:17 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Illegal weapons are easily procured in urban open-air markets despite a government initiative launched in 2006 to curb the availability of arms.
# ::save-date Fri Jul 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070331_0467_8.txt
(p / procure-01
  :ARG1 (w / weapon
          :mod (l / law
                 :polarity -))
  :manner (e / easy)
  :location (m / market
              :mod (u / urban)
              :mod (o / open-air))
  :ARG1-of (h / have-concession-91
             :ARG2 (i / initiate-01
                     :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                             :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))
                     :ARG1 (c / curb-01
                             :ARG1 (a3 / available
                                     :domain (a / arm)))
                     :ARG1-of (l2 / launch-01
                                :ARG0 g
                                :time (d / date-entity
                                        :year 2006)))))

                             :mod (s2 / security))))
  :time (c2 / ceremony
          :purpose (b / burn-01
                     :ARG1 (a / arm
                             :quant 8000
                             :mod (l / law
                                    :polarity -)
                             :ARG1-of (s3 / seize-01
                                        :time (d / date-entity
                                                :year 2006)
                                        :purpose (p / prevent-01
                                                   :ARG1 (s4 / spread-03
                                                           :ARG1 (f / firearm)))))))
  :time (r / recent))

         :ARG0 (f3 / firearm)

                 :ARG1 (r / resource

                 :mod (l / law
                        :polarity -)))
  :op2 (a3 / abet-01
         :ARG0 f3

                 :op1 (t / terrorism)
                 :op2 (c / crime
                        :mod (o / other)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070331_0467.11 ::date 2013-06-09T18:03:50 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The easy affordability and accessibility of arms reduces incentives to pursue non-violent solutions to conflicts and initiates a spiral of insecurity.
# ::save-date Fri Jul 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070331_0467_11.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (r / reduce-01
         :ARG0 (a4 / and
                 :op1 (a2 / afford-01
                        :ARG1 (a3 / arm)
                        :mod (p2 / possible))
                 :op2 (a5 / access-01
                        :ARG1 a3
                        :mod (p3 / possible))
                 :mod (e / easy))
         :ARG1 (t / thing
                 :ARG0-of (i / incentivize-01
                            :ARG2 (p / pursue-01
                                    :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                                            :ARG2-of (s / solve-01
                                                       :ARG1 (c / conflict-01))
                                            :mod (v / violence
                                                   :polarity -))))))
  :op2 (i2 / initiate-01
         :ARG0 a4
         :ARG1 (s2 / spiral
                 :mod (s3 / security
                        :polarity -))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070331_0467.13 ::date 2013-06-11T02:14:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

(i / include-01
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (i2 / insurgency
                  :duration (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 20
                        :unit (y2 / year))
                  :location (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Uganda")))
            :op2 (a2 / anarchy
                  :location (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Somalia"))
                  :time (s / since
                        :op1 (d2 / date-entity :year 1991)))
            :op3 (w / war
                  :mod (c5 / civil)
                  :location (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Sudan"))
                  :mod (f / former)))
      :ARG2 (c4 / conflict-01))

# ::save-date Mon Jun 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070331_0467_15.txt
(c3 / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (e / experience-01
            :ARG0 (c4 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Kenya"))
            :ARG1 (t / traffic-00
                  :ARG1 (a / arm)
                  :manner (s / serious))
            :time (a2 / always))
      :ARG2 (p / present-01
            :ARG0 (s2 / sell-01
                  :ARG1 (a3 / arm)
                  :location (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Somalia"))
                  :manner (f / free))
            :ARG1 (p2 / problem
                  :mod (a4 / additional))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070331_0467.16 ::date 2013-06-09T17:52:00 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                              :op1 (s3 / south)

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070331_0467.21 ::date 2013-06-09T16:56:13 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Forced disarmament process has never been successful because it fails to address the impetus of the demand: competition for natural resources and a lack of government security forces.
# ::save-date Fri Jul 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070331_0467_21.txt
(s / succeed-01
  :ARG0 (p / process
          :mod (d / disarm-01
                 :ARG1-of (f / force-01)))
  :polarity -
  :time (e / ever)
  :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
             :ARG0 (f2 / fail-01
                     :ARG1 p
                     :ARG2 (a / address-02
                             :ARG0 p
                             :ARG1 (i / impetus
                                     :poss (d2 / demand-01)
                                     :consist-of (a2 / and
                                                   :op1 (c2 / compete-01
                                                          :ARG2 (r / resource
                                                                  :mod (n / nature)))
                                                   :op2 (l / lack-01
                                                          :ARG1 (f3 / force
                                                                  :mod (s2 / security)
                                                                  :mod (g / government-organization
                                                                         :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070331_0467.22 ::date 2013-06-10T06:19:13 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Pastoral communities in northern Kenya frequently resolve tribal conflicts concerning water and land access by gun battles.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070331_0467_22.txt
(r / resolve-01
      :ARG0 (c / community
            :mod (p / pastoral)
            :location (n2 / north
                  :part-of (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Kenya"))))
      :ARG1 (c3 / conflict-01
            :ARG0 (t / tribe)
            :ARG0-of (c4 / concern-02
                  :ARG1 (a2 / access-01
                        :ARG1 (a / and
                              :op1 (w / water)
                              :op2 (l / land)))))
      :ARG2 (b / battle-01
            :instrument (g / gun))
      :frequency (f / frequent))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070331_0467.23 ::date 2013-06-11T03:59:05 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :domain (r / reach-01
                        :ARG1 (d / deal-01
                              :ARG1 (p3 / peace
                                    :location (w / world-region :name (n2 / name :op1 "Middle" :op2 "East"))))))
            :ARG2 (a / agree-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / secure-02)
                  :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                        :ARG2 (e / eradicate-01
                              :ARG1 (w2 / weapon
                                    :ARG2-of (d2 / destroy-01
                                          :degree (m / mass))
                                    :quant (a2 / all))
                              :location (w3 / w))))
            :mod (o / only)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070415_0167.6 ::date 2013-06-08T09:57:54 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt According to the Government of Jordan UN atomic energy chief Mohamed ElBaradei speaking on 15 April 2007 after talks in Jordan with Jordan's King Abdullah II urged Iran and Israel to join a nuclear-free zone in the Middle East.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070415_0167_6.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Jordan"))))
      :ARG1 (u / urge-01
            :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Mohamed" :op2 "ElBaradei")
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "UN"))
                        :ARG2 (c / chief
                              :ARG0-of (s2 / speak-01
                                    :time (d / date-entity :month 4 :day 15 :year 2007)
                                    :time (a3 / after
                                          :op1 (t / talk-01
                                                :ARG0 c
                                                :ARG1 (k / king :name (n8 / name :op1 "Abdullah" :op2 "II")
                                                      :poss c2)
                                                :location c2)))
                              :mod (e / energy
                                    :mod (a / atom)))))
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                  :op2 (c4 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Israel")))
            :ARG2 (j / join-01
                  :ARG0 a2
                  :ARG1 (z / zone
                        :ARG1-of (f / free-41
                              :mod (n6 / nucleus))
                        :location (w / world-region :name (n7 / name :op1 "Middle" :op2 "East"))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070415_0167.7 ::date 2013-06-08T09:58:17 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

          :op1 "ElBaradei")

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070415_0167.10 ::date 2013-06-08T10:03:41 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG1-of (b3 / base-02
                              :ARG2 (p2 / possess-01 :polarity -
                                    :ARG1 (w2 / weapon
                                          :mod (n3 / nucleus)))))
                  :location (w / world-region :name (n2 / name :op1 "Middle" :op2 "East")))

            :domain (t / this)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070415_0167.11 ::date 2013-06-08T10:05:50 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

(q / quote-01
      :ARG1 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "ElBaradei"))
      :ARG2 (o / obligate-01
            :ARG2 (r / reach-01
                  :ARG1 (d / deal-01
                        :ARG0 (a / and
                              :op1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Israel"))
                              :op2 (n3 / neighbor
                                    :mod (e / ethnic-group :name (n4 / name :op1 "Arab"))
                                    :poss c))
                        :mod (p2 / peace))
                  :manner (a3 / agree-01
                        :ARG1 (s / security)
                        :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                              :ARG2 (e2 / eradicate-01
                                    :ARG1 (w / weapon
                                          :quant (a4 / all)
                                          :ARG2-of (d2 / destroy-01
                                                :degree (m / mass)))
                                    :location (r2 / region)))))))

                  :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Israel"))

                        :mod (n5 / nucleus)))

                        :mod (a2 / atom))))

            :mod (e / enemy
                  :poss (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Israel")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070419_0476.4 ::date 2013-06-10T08:18:50 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Sun Jul 21, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070419_0476_4.txt
(b / ban-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "India"))
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (a / and
                  :op1 (e / export-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (m / material)
                              :op2 (g / goods)
                              :op2 (t / technology)
                              :ARG0-of (a5 / aid-01
                                    :ARG2 (p2 / program
                                          :mod (n4 / nucleus)
                                          :ARG1-of (s / suspect-01)
                                          :poss a4)
                                    :mod (p / possible)))
                        :ARG2 (a4 / and
                              :op1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))
                              :op2 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iran"))))
                  :op2 (i / import-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 a3
                        :ARG2 a4)
                  :mod (d / direct))
            :op2 (a7 / and
                  :op1 (e2 / export-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 a3
                        :ARG2 a4)
                  :op2 (i2 / import-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 a3
                        :ARG2 a4)
                  :mod (d2 / direct :polarity -))
            :mod (a8 / all)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070419_0476.15 ::date 2013-06-10T12:47:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

(r / repeat-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "India"))

            :ARG0 c

                  :purpose (r3 / resolve-01
                        :ARG0 c

                                    :poss (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))

         :time (d / date-entity
                 :year 1995)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070428_0521.9 ::date 2013-06-18T07:24:55 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The NPT has 188 signatory States and is a deal in which nuclear weapons States agree to disarm while nations without the bomb agree not to seek the bomb.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070428_0521_9.txt
(a2 / and
      :op1 (s4 / sign-02
            :ARG0 (s / state :quant 188)
            :ARG1 (t / treaty :name (n2 / name :op1 "NPT")))
      :op2 (d / deal-01
            :topic (c / contrast-01
                  :ARG1 (a / agree-01
                        :ARG0 (s3 / state
                              :mod (w / weapon
                                    :mod (n3 / nucleus)))
                        :ARG1 (d2 / disarm-01
                              :ARG0 s3))
                  :ARG2 (a4 / agree-01
                        :ARG0 (n4 / nation
                              :prep-without b)
                        :ARG1 (s2 / seek-01 :polarity -
                              :ARG0 n4
                              :ARG1 (b / bomb))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070428_0521.10 ::date 2013-06-18T08:15:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

(r / review-01
      :ARG1 (t2 / treaty :name (n2 / name :op1 "NPT"))
      :frequency (r2 / rate-entity-91
            :ARG3 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 5
                  :unit (y / year))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070428_0521.11 ::date 2013-06-28T04:51:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

          :time (d / date-entity
                  :month 5
                  :year 2005))

          :ARG1 (q / question
                  :mod (k / key)
                  :mod (a2 / any)))

             :ARG0 (d2 / disagree-01
                     :ARG0 (c2 / country
                             :ARG1-of (a3 / align-01
                                        :polarity -))
                     :ARG1 (p / power
                             :mod (n2 / nucleus))
                     :ARG2 (a / agenda))))

# ::save-date Tue Jun 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070430_0038_4.txt

      :ARG0 (a / and
            :op1 (t / troop
                  :ARG1-of (l / lead-02
                        :ARG0 (m2 / military :name (n / name :op1 "NATO"))))
            :op2 (t2 / troop
                  :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))))

            :ARG0 a
            :ARG1 (v / valley :name (n5 / name :op1 "Sangin" :op2 "Valley")
                  :mod (l2 / low
                        :degree (m / more)))
            :ARG2 (c3 / criminal-organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "Taliban"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070430_0038.5 ::date 2013-06-12T14:08:00 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Sangin valley is located in Afghanistan's premier opium producing Helmand province and is said to be home to some Taliban leaders.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 22, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070430_0038_5.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (b / be-located-at-91
         :ARG1 (v / valley
                 :name (n / name
                         :op1 "Sangin"
                         :op2 "Valley"))
         :ARG2 (p / province
                 :name (n3 / name
                         :op1 "Helmand")
                 :location (c / country
                             :name (n4 / name
                                     :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                 :ARG0-of (p2 / produce-01
                            :ARG1 (o / opium))
                 :mod (p3 / premier)))
  :op2 (s2 / say-01
         :ARG1 (h / home
                 :beneficiary (p4 / person
                                :ARG0-of (l / lead-02
                                           :ARG1 (c2 / criminal-organization
                                                   :name (n5 / name
                                                           :op1 "Taliban")))
                                :quant (s / some))
                 :domain v)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070430_0038.6 ::date 2013-06-12T14:21:15 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt A spokesman for the British deployment to Afghanistan stated to AFP that approximately 2000 NATO-led and Afghan troops initiated Operation silicon on 30 April 2007 to clear the Taliban from the lower Sangin valley in Afghanistan's premier opium producing Helmand province.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070430_0038_6.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p5 / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (p6 / person
                        :ARG1-of (d / deploy-01
                              :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Britain"))
                              :location (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))))
                  :ARG2 (s2 / spokesman)))
      :ARG1 (i / initiate-01
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (t / troop
                        :ARG1-of (l / lead-02
                              :ARG0 (m / military :name (n4 / name :op1 "NATO"))))
                  :op2 (t2 / troop
                        :mod c2)
                  :quant (a2 / approximately :op1 2000))
            :ARG1 (o3 / operation :name (n6 / name :op1 "Operation" :op2 "Silicon"))
            :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2007 :month 4 :day 30)
            :purpose (c4 / clear-01
                  :ARG0 a
                  :ARG1 (v / valley :name (n8 / name :op1 "Sangin" :op2 "Valley")
                        :location (p / province :name (n9 / name :op1 "Helmand")
                              :poss c2
                              :ARG0-of (p2 / produce-01
                                    :ARG1 (o4 / opium))
                              :mod (p3 / premier))
                        :mod (l2 / low
                              :degree (m2 / more)))
                  :ARG2 (c5 / criminal-organization :name (n7 / name :op1 "Taliban"))))
      :ARG2 (p4 / publication :name (n3 / name :op1 "AFP")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070430_0038.7 ::date 2013-06-13T00:10:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (o / operation :name (n / name :op1 "Operation" :op2 "Achilles"))
      :ARG2 (o2 / operation :name (n2 / name :op1 "Operation" :op2 "Silicon")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070430_0038.8 ::date 2013-06-13T01:38:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Operation Achilles is NATO's International Security Assistance Force's (ISAF) biggest campaign against the Taliban, foreign fighters and drugs barons and began in Helmand on approximately 30 February 2007.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 22, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070430_0038_8.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (c / campaign-01
         :ARG0 (m3 / military
                 :name (n / name
                         :op1 "International"
                         :op2 "Security"
                         :op3 "Assistance"
                         :op4 "Force")
                 :poss (m2 / military
                         :name (n2 / name
                                 :op1 "NATO")))
         :ARG1 (a2 / against
                 :op1 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (c2 / criminal-organization
                               :name (n4 / name
                                       :op1 "Taliban"))
                        :op2 (p / person
                               :ARG0-of (f / fight-01)
                               :mod (f2 / foreign))
                        :op3 (b2 / baron
                               :mod (d / drug))))
         :domain (o3 / operation
                   :name (n3 / name
                           :op1 "Operation"
                           :op2 "Achilles"))
         :mod (b / big
                :degree (m / most)))
  :op2 (b3 / begin-01
         :ARG1 o3
         :location (p2 / province
                     :name (n5 / name
                             :op1 "Helmand"))
         :time (a5 / approximately
                 :op1 (d2 / date-entity
                        :year 2007
                        :month 4
                        :day 30))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070430_0038.9 ::date 2013-06-13T02:10:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Achilles involves about 5500 soldiers from countries including Britain, Canada, the Netherlands and the United States as well as 1000 Afghans.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070430_0038_9.txt
(i / involve-01
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (s / soldier
                  :source (c / country
                        :ARG2-of (i2 / include-01
                              :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                    :op1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Britain"))
                                    :op2 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Canada"))
                                    :op3 (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Netherlands"))
                                    :op4 (c5 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))))
                  :quant (a3 / about :op1 5500))
            :op2 (p / person :quant 1000
                  :mod (c6 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))))
      :ARG2 (e / event :name (n / name :op1 "Achilles")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070430_0038.10 ::date 2013-06-13T02:28:58 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :quant (m3 / most)
            :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                  :ARG2 (t2 / troop
                        :poss (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Britain"))
                        :part-of (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "ISAF"))
                        :quant (m / more-than :op1 5000))))
      :location (p / province :name (n3 / name :op1 "Helmand")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070430_0038.11 ::date 2013-06-13T02:41:13 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :ARG1 (c2 / capital :name (n / name :op1 "Sangin")

                        :unit (k / kilometer))
                  :direction (n3 / northeast)))

            :domain c2

                  :ARG1 (p2 / person

                                    :op1 (f2 / force
                                          :poss p2)
                                    :op2 (b / baron
                                          :mod (d2 / drug)
                                          :location (p3 / province :name (n5 / name :op1 "Helmand"))))
                              :ARG1-of (s2 / say-01)))
                  :frequency (r2 / regular))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070430_0038.12 ::date 2013-06-13T03:19:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

  :ARG0 (c / city
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Sangin"))

                                        :ARG1 (o3 / opium
                                                :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91
                                                           :ARG2 (o4 / opium
                                                                   :mod (l / law
                                                                          :polarity -)
                                                                   :poss (w / world))
                                                           :ARG3 (m2 / more-than
                                                                   :op1 (p3 / percentage-entity
                                                                          :value 90))))))
                     :ARG3 (a2 / about
                             :op1 (p2 / percentage-entity
                                    :value 40)))))

          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Andrus"
                  :op2 "Ansip")

                     :ARG1 (c / country
                             :name (n2 / name
                                     :op1 "Estonia"))
                     :ARG2 (m / minister
                             :mod (p / prime))))

          :ARG1 (a / attack-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / server
                          :poss (g / government-organization
                                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                             :ARG1 c))))
          :ARG0-of (f / force-02
                     :ARG1 (s3 / shut-05
                             :ARG1 s2
                             :duration (t / temporary))))
  :time (e / early
          :op1 (d / date-entity
                 :year 2007
                 :month 5)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070521_0178.15 ::date 2013-06-14T08:11:47 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Estonia"))
      :ARG1 (b2 / bar-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (a / access-01
                  :ARG1 (a6 / and
