                                    :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))
                              :mod (k / key))
                        :op2 (w3 / website
                              :mod (p / private)
                              :quant (s / some)))))
      :time (b / before
            :op1 (n2 / now)
            :quant (t / temporal-quantity :quant 3
                  :unit (w2 / week)))
      :time (a4 / after
            :op1 (o / onset
                  :poss (a5 / attack-01
                        :ARG1 c
                        :mod (c2 / cyber)
                        :quant (s2 / series)))))

                  :quant (s2 / series))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070524_0504.8 ::date 2013-06-16T12:51:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The cyber attacks were triggered by Estonian authorities' decision to remove a Soviet war memorial from central Tallinn which angered Russian officials and the large ethnic Russian minority in Estonia.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 12, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070524_0504_8.txt
(t / trigger-01
      :ARG0 (d / decide-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / authority
                  :mod (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Estonia")))
            :ARG1 (r / remove-01
                  :ARG0 a2
                  :ARG1 (m / memorial
                        :mod (w / war)
                        :mod (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Soviet Union")))
                  :ARG2 (c4 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Tallinn")
                        :mod (c6 / center)))
            :ARG0-of (a3 / anger-01
                  :ARG1 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (p / person
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (c5 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Russia"))
                                    :ARG2 (o / official)))
                        :op2 (m2 / minority
                              :mod (e / ethnic)
                              :mod c5
                              :mod (l / large)
                              :location c2))))
      :ARG1 (a / attack-01
            :mod (c / cyber)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070524_0504.9 ::date 2013-06-16T12:51:42 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :op2 (s / state

                        :ARG1 (o2 / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "EU"))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070525_0061.24 ::date 2013-06-17T13:50:15 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :mod (c / cruise)
                  :mod (s4 / ship-to-surface)))

(u / use-01
      :ARG1 (t / technology
            :ARG0-of (m / make-02
                  :ARG1 (d / difficult
                        :domain (d2 / detect-01
                              :ARG2 (r / radar))
                        :degree (m2 / more)))
            :mod (s / stealth))
      :ARG2 (b / build-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / ship :name (n / name :op1 "King" :op2 "Sejong"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070529_0077.4 ::date 2013-09-01T02:34:52 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                                                   :mod (c5 / country
                                                          :name (n6 / name

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070529_0077.5 ::date 2013-09-01T03:33:34 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (p2 / plan-01

                  :ARG0 (c6 / country :name (n9 / name :op1 "Russia"))

                        :ARG0 c6

                                          :mod (c9 / convention)))
                              :mod (c10 / continent :name (n10 / name :op1 "Europe"))))
                  :time (c11 / continue-01
                        :ARG0 c6
                        :ARG1 (w2 / work-01
                              :ARG0 c6
                              :ARG1 (r2 / regain-01
                                    :ARG0 c6
                                    :ARG1 (p4 / parity
                                          :mod (m / military)
                                          :prep-with c5)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070529_0077.6 ::date 2013-09-01T04:05:49 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

  :time (d2 / date-entity
          :day 29
          :month 5

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070529_0077.7 ::date 2013-09-01T05:23:04 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Wed Sep 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070529_0077_7.txt

  :ARG0 (f / force
          :mod (m / missile)
          :poss (c2 / country
                  :name (n5 / name
                          :op1 "Russia"))
          :mod (s / strategic))
  :ARG1 (t / thing
          :ARG1-of (s2 / state-01)
          :ARG0-of (s3 / say-01
                     :ARG1 (a / and
                             :op1 (f2 / fire-01
                                    :ARG1 (r / rocket
                                            :name (n / name
                                                    :op1 "RS-24"))
                                    :source (r2 / region
                                              :mod (n7 / northeast)
                                              :part-of (c3 / city
                                                         :name (n8 / name
                                                                 :op1 "Arkhangelsk"))))

                                    :ARG1 (t3 / thing
                                            :ARG1-of (t2 / target-01
                                                       :ARG2 r)
                                            :location (l2 / location
                                                        :name (n9 / name
                                                                :op1 "Kamchatka"
                                                                :op2 "Peninsula")
                                                        :location (r3 / relative-position
                                                                    :op1 c3
                                                                    :quant (d2 / distance-quantity
                                                                             :quant 6000
                                                                             :unit (k2 / kilometer))))))))))

                  :ARG1 (c11 / continent :name (n12 / name :op1 "Europe"))

                              :op1 (c12 / country :name (n13 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                              :op2 (c13 / country :name (n14 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea")))

                  :ARG0 a
                  :ARG2 (c14 / country :name (n15 / name :op1 "Russia")))))

                        :ARG2 (a3 / attack-01

                 :mod (s3 / serious))

                        :op1 (k / know-01
                               :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                                       :name (n3 / name
                                               :op1 "Kremlin"))

                        :mode interrogative)))

            :ARG0 (a / agency :name (n / name :op1 "AFP"))
            :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                  :ARG2 (t2 / thing
                        :mod (o / official)
                        :ARG1-of (s2 / state-01)))))

            :op1 (d2 / date-entity :year 1999))

            :ARG0 (s2 / state-01

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070625_0217.14 ::date 2013-06-16T10:07:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Afghanistan produced a record 6000 tons of opium in 2006.

(p / produce-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))

            :quant (m / mass-quantity :quant 6000
                  :unit (t / ton)
                  :mod (r / record)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2006))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070625_0217.15 ::date 2013-06-16T10:08:38 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG0 (i / increase-01

                                    :ARG1 (o2 / opium)

                                          :mod (s2 / south))))))))

      :ARG0 (c / continent :name (n / name :op1 "Europe"))

            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (s / station
                        :mod (r2 / radar
                              :ARG0-of (c5 / counter-01
                                    :ARG1 (m / missile)))
                        :location (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Czech" :op2 "Republic")))

                        :instrument-of (i / intercept-01)
                        :location (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Poland")))))

                              :ARG1 (c2 / confidence)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070714_0273.16 ::date 2013-06-19T06:59:21 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The treaty was adapted in Istanbul in 1999 following the collapse of the Warsaw Pact in order to limit deployments on a country-by-country basis.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 22, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070714_0273_16.txt
(a / adapt-01
      :ARG1 (t / treaty)
      :ARG1-of (f / follow-01
            :ARG2 (c / collapse-01
                  :ARG1 (m2 / military :name (n4 / name :op1 "Warsaw" :op2 "Pact"))))
      :location (c2 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Istanbul"))
      :time (d2 / date-entity :year 1999)
      :purpose (l / limit-01
            :ARG0 t
            :ARG1 (d / deploy-01
                  :manner (b / basis
                        :mod (c4 / country-by-country)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070714_0273.18 ::date 2013-06-21T08:35:10 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Jul 22, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070714_0273_18.txt

      :ARG0 (s / state
            :poss (m / military :name (n / name :op1 "NATO")))

            :ARG0 s
            :ARG2 (p / pact
                  :mod (n2 / new)))
      :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (f / fail-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Russia"))
                  :ARG2 (h / honor-02
                        :ARG0 c2
                        :ARG1 (c3 / commit-01
                              :ARG1 c2
                              :ARG2 (w / withdraw-01
                                    :ARG0 c2
                                    :ARG1 (f2 / force)
                                    :ARG2 (a2 / and
                                          :op1 (r3 / republic :name (n6 / name :op1 "Georgia"))
                                          :op2 (r4 / republic :name (n7 / name :op1 "Moldova"))
                                          :mod (c5 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Soviet" :op2 "Union"))
                                          :mod (f3 / former)))
                              :location (t / thing
                                    :ARG1-of (a / adapt-01
                                          :location (c4 / city :name (n4 / name :op1 "Istanbul")))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070714_0310.5 ::date 2013-06-25T06:42:54 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (f / force
                              :ARG1-of (a3 / arm-01))
                        :op2 (w2 / weaponry
                              :mod (h / heavy)))))

                  :ARG1-of (a4 / aim-02
                        :ARG2 (c3 / cooperate-01
                              :ARG0 (s / state
                                    :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG2 (m2 / member))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070715_0100.6 ::date 2013-09-01T15:40:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Wed Sep 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070715_0100_6.txt

          :name (n8 / name
                  :op1 "Amnesty"

                     :location (c7 / city
                                 :name (n9 / name
                                         :op1 "London"))))

          :ARG0 (p2 / plan-01
                  :ARG0 (c9 / country
                          :name (n12 / name
                                  :op1 "India"))

                          :ARG1 (h / helicopter
                                  :purpose (a3 / attack-01)
                                  :consist-of (c10 / component
                                                :ARG1-of (p3 / produce-01
                                                           :location (c11 / continent
                                                                       :name (n13 / name
                                                                               :op1 "Europe")))
                                                :mod (v / vital)))
                          :ARG2 c8))
          :ARG2 (e / embargo-01
                  :ARG0 (o2 / organization
                          :name (n11 / name
                                  :op1 "EU"))
                  :ARG1 (a / arm)
                  :beneficiary (c8 / country
                                 :name (n10 / name
                                         :op1 "Myanmar"))
                  :ARG1-of (a2 / age-01
                             :ARG2 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                                     :quant 19
                                     :unit (y2 / year)))))
  :time (d2 / date-entity
          :year 2007
          :month 7
          :day 16))

                        :source (c5 / country

                                          :op1 "Britain")))
                 :op5 (e2 / equipment
                        :instrument-of (p / protect-01
                                         :ARG1 (s2 / self))

  :op2 (r3 / receive-01
         :ARG0 v

                 :op1 (d / develop-01
                        :ARG2 (d2 / design))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070715_0100.16 ::date 2013-09-01T16:51:59 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The EU should immediately commence talks with India to prevent future sales of the alh, components or technology to India.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070715_0100_16.txt
(r / recommend-01
      :ARG1 (c4 / commence-01
            :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "EU"))
            :ARG1 (t / talk-01
                  :ARG0 o
                  :ARG2 (c5 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "India"))
                  :purpose (p / prevent-01
                        :ARG0 o
                        :ARG1 (s / sell-01
                              :ARG1 (o2 / or
                                    :op1 (a2 / aircraft :name (n6 / name :op1 "ALH"))
                                    :op2 (c6 / component)
                                    :op3 (t2 / technology))
                              :ARG2 c5
                              :time (f / future))))
            :time (i / immediate)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070715_0100.17 ::date 2013-09-01T17:02:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt All future EU cooperation with India that could supply Myanmar with banned items should be discontinued.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 5, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070715_0100_17.txt
(r / recommend-01
      :ARG1 (d / discontinue-01
            :ARG1 (c4 / cooperate-01
                  :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "EU"))
                  :ARG1 (c5 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "India"))
                  :time (f / future)
                  :ARG0-of (s / supply-01
                        :ARG1 (i / item
                              :ARG1-of (b / ban-01))
                        :ARG2 (c6 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Myanmar"))
                        :mod (p / possible))
                  :mod (a / all))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070715_0100.18 ::date 2013-09-01T17:14:19 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Any future arms deals with India should prohibit the transfer of technology to Myanmar.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070715_0100_18.txt
(r / recommend-01
  :ARG1 (p / prohibit-01
          :ARG0 (d / deal-01
                  :ARG1 (c4 / country
                          :name (n4 / name
                                  :op1 "India"))
                  :mod (a / arm)
                  :time (f / future)
                  :mod (a2 / any))
          :ARG1 (t / transfer-01
                  :ARG1 (t2 / technology)
                  :ARG2 (c3 / country
                          :name (n3 / name
                                  :op1 "Myanmar")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070715_0100.19 ::date 2013-09-01T17:20:38 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt India does not have an arms embargo to Myanmar.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070715_0100_19.txt
(h / have-03
  :ARG0 (c3 / country
          :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "India"))
  :ARG1 (e / embargo-01
          :ARG1 (a / arm)
          :beneficiary (c4 / country
                         :name (n4 / name
                                 :op1 "Myanmar")))
  :polarity -)

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070715_0100.20 ::date 2013-09-01T17:23:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The UN has noted that Myanmar's widespread and systematic human rights violations include summary executions, torture and recruitment of child soldiers.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070715_0100_20.txt
(n3 / note-01
  :ARG0 (o2 / organization
          :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "UN"))
  :ARG1 (i / include-01
          :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (e / execute-01
                         :mod (s4 / summary))
                  :op2 (t / torture-01)
                  :op3 (r2 / recruit-01
                         :ARG1 (s3 / soldier
                                 :mod (c2 / child))))
          :ARG2 (v / violate-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country
                          :name (n / name
                                  :op1 "Myanmar"))
                  :ARG1 (r / right
                          :mod (h / human))
                  :mod (w / widespread)
                  :mod (s / systematic))))

      :op4 (b / business))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0392.4 ::date 2013-06-13T08:47:47 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Amnesty International has published a report stating that an Indian project to sell attack helicopters to Myanmar threatens a European Union arms embargo against Myanmar.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0392_4.txt
(p / publish-01
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Amnesty" :op2 "International"))
      :ARG1 (r / report
            :ARG0-of (s / state-01
                  :ARG1 (t / threaten-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / project
                              :topic (s2 / sell-01
                                    :ARG1 (h / helicopter
                                          :ARG0-of (a / attack-01))
                                    :ARG2 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Myanmar")))
                              :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "India")))
                        :ARG2 (e / embargo-01
                              :ARG0 (o2 / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "European" :op2 "Union"))
                              :ARG1 (a2 / arm)
                              :prep-against c2)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0392.5 ::date 2013-06-13T09:03:19 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt On 16 July 2007 an Amnesty International report was released stating --
# ::save-date Thu Jun 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0392_5.txt
(r / release-01
  :ARG1 (r2 / report
          :mod (o / organization
                 :name (n / name :op1 "Amnesty" :op2 "International"))
          :ARG0-of (s / state-01))
  :time (d / date-entity :year 2007 :month 7 :day 16))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0392.6 ::date 2013-06-15T11:43:04 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG0-of (a2 / attack-01))
                  :ARG2 (o / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "TK"))))

            :ARG0 (o2 / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "European" :op2 "Union"))

            :prep-against (c2 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Myanmar"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0392.7 ::date 2013-06-13T09:23:39 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (a / and
            :op1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "France"))

            :op5 (c5 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Italy"))
            :op6 (c6 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Britain")))
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (p2 / part)
            :op2 (t / technology))
      :purpose (a3 / aircraft-type :name (n7 / name :op1 "Advanced" :op2 "Light" :op3 "Helicopter")))

      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Myanmar"))
      :ARG1 (s / sell-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (g / gas)
            :ARG2 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))
            :ARG1-of (c5 / contrast-01
                  :ARG2 (s2 / sell-01 :polarity -
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 g
                        :ARG2 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "India")))))
      :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2007 :month 3))

      :ARG0 (t / thing
            :ARG1-of (d / decide-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Myanmar"))))
      :ARG1 (i / influence-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))

            :ARG1-of (g / grow-01)))

            :ARG1 (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Myanmar"))
            :ARG2 (d / disrupt-01
                  :ARG0 c3
                  :ARG1 (f / flow-01
                        :ARG1 (s3 / separatist
                              :ARG0-of (r2 / rebel-01)

                                    :ARG1 (b / border))))
                  :direction (i / into

                              :op3 (t2 / technology
                                    :mod (m / military)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0392.30 ::date 2013-06-13T12:54:00 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (s2 / stop-01

                  :ARG1 (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "India"))
                  :ARG2 (p / produce-01)
                  :time (f / future)
                  :quant (a / all)
                  :ARG0-of (l / lead-03
                        :ARG2 (e / end-03
                              :ARG1 (i / item
                                    :ARG1-of (b / ban-01))
                              :ARG2 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Myanmar")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0392.33 ::date 2013-06-13T14:05:53 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The EU embargo explicitly states that no military equipment should be supplied either directly or indirectly for use in Myanmar.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0392_33.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (e / embargo-01
            :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "EU")))
      :ARG1 (r / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / supply-01 :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (e3 / equipment
                        :mod (m / military))
                  :manner (o2 / or
                        :op1 (d / direct)
                        :op2 (d2 / direct :polarity -))
                  :purpose (u / use-01
                        :location (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Myanmar")))))
      :manner (e2 / explicit))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0392.34 ::date 2013-06-13T14:20:15 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu Jun 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0392_34.txt
(h / have-purpose-91 :polarity -
      :ARG1 (e / embargo-01
            :ARG1 (a / arm))
      :condition (o / or
            :op1 (i / implement-01 :polarity -
                  :ARG1 e)
            :op2 (e2 / enforce-01 :polarity -
                  :ARG1 e)))

                              :duration (l / long))))

                  :op1 (c2 / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Moscow")))
            :time (l3 / late
                  :op1 (m3 / month
                        :mod (t2 / this))
                  :degree (m4 / more))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0417.5 ::date 2013-06-14T10:47:23 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :time (d / date-entity :year 2007 :month 7 :day 16))

      :ARG0 (i / it)
      :ARG1 (t / threaten-01
            :ARG0 (c / country
                  :example (a / and
                        :op1 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))
                        :op2 (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))))
            :ARG1 (m / missile)
            :mod (p / potential)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0417.18 ::date 2013-06-15T02:34:17 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "Kremlin"))

            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia"))
            :ARG1 c
            :ARG2 (t / treaty :name (n3 / name :op1 "Conventional" :op2 "Forces" :op3 "in" :op4 "Europe" :op5 "Treaty")
                  :time (d2 / date-entity :year 1990)
                  :ARG0-of (l / limit-01
                        :ARG1 (d3 / deploy-01
                              :ARG1 (a / arm)
                              :location (c2 / continent :name (n4 / name :op1 "Europe"))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0508.4 ::date 2013-06-15T02:44:31 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Amnesty International revealed in a report published on July 16, 2007 which stated that a European Union arms embargo against Myanmar is under threat from an Indian project to sell helicopters to Myanmar.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0508_4.txt
(r / reveal-01
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Amnesty" :op2 "International"))
      :medium (r2 / report
            :ARG1-of (p / publish-01
                  :time (d / date-entity :year 2007 :month 7 :day 16))
            :ARG0-of (s / state-01
                  :ARG1 (t / threaten-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / project
                              :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "India"))
                              :topic (s2 / sell-01
                                    :ARG0 c
                                    :ARG1 (h / helicopter)
                                    :ARG2 (c3 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Myanmar"))))
                        :ARG2 (e / embargo-01
                              :ARG0 (o2 / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "European" :op2 "Union"))
                              :ARG1 (a / arm)
                              :prep-against c3)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0508.5 ::date 2013-06-15T02:58:22 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                              :topic (s2 / sell-01
                                    :ARG1 (h / helicopter
                                          :mod (m / military))
                                    :ARG2 (c3 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Myanmar"))))
                        :ARG2 (e / embargo-01
                              :ARG0 (o2 / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "European" :op2 "Union"))
                              :ARG1 (a / arm)
                              :prep-against c3))))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2007 :month 7 :day 16))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0508.6 ::date 2013-06-15T03:05:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The report titled "Indian helicopters for Myanmar: making a mockery of the EU arms embargo?" was compiled by European and international non-governmental organizations including saferworld.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 12, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0508_6.txt
(c / compile-01
  :ARG0 (a / and
          :op1 (g / government-organization
                 :polarity -
                 :mod (c2 / continent
                        :name (n / name
                                :op1 "Europe")))
          :op2 (g3 / government-organization
                 :polarity -
                 :mod (i / international))
          :ARG2-of (i2 / include-91
                     :ARG1 (o / organization
                             :name (n2 / name
                                     :op1 "Saferworld"))))
  :ARG1 (r / report
          :ARG1-of (t / title-01
                     :ARG2 (h / helicopter
                             :source (c3 / country
                                       :name (n3 / name
                                               :op1 "India"))
                             :beneficiary (c4 / country
                                            :name (n4 / name
                                                    :op1 "Myanmar"))
                             :ARG0-of (m2 / mean-01
                                        :ARG1 (m / mock-01
                                                :ARG1 (e / embargo-01
                                                        :ARG0 (o2 / organization
                                                                :name (n5 / name
                                                                        :op1 "EU"))
                                                        :ARG1 (a2 / arm))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0508.7 ::date 2013-06-15T03:13:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu Sep 12, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0508_7.txt

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Roy" :op2 "Isbister")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Saferworld"))
                  :ARG3 (l / lead-02
                        :ARG1 (t / team)
                        :topic (a / and
                              :op1 (c / control-01
                                    :ARG1 (t2 / transfer-01))
                              :op2 (a2 / arm
                                    :mod (s2 / small))))))
      :ARG1 (s3 / state-01
            :ARG0 (e / embargo-01)
            :ARG1 (r / recommend-01
                  :ARG1 (s4 / supply-01 :polarity -
                        :ARG1 (e2 / equipment
                              :mod (m / military))
                        :ARG2 (u / use-01
                              :ARG1 e2
                              :location (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Myanmar")))
                        :manner (o2 / or
                              :op1 (d / direct)
                              :op2 (d2 / direct :polarity -))))
            :manner (e3 / explicit)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0508.8 ::date 2013-06-15T03:24:42 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (r / report)
      :ARG1 (c / company
            :location (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))

                  :ARG1 (e / equipment)

                  :concession (e2 / embargo-01
                        :ARG1 (a / arm)
                        :mod (r2 / resemble-01))))
      :mod (a2 / also))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0508.9 ::date 2013-06-15T03:29:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0508.10 ::date 2013-06-15T03:31:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Jun 21, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0508_10.txt

      :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Belgium"))

            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (t / talk-01
                  :ARG0 c

                  :time (i / immediate))
            :purpose (p / prevent-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (s / sell-01
                        :ARG1 (w / weapon)
                        :ARG2 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Myanmar"))
                        :time (f / future)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0508.11 ::date 2013-06-15T04:09:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :prep-against (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Myanmar"))
      :duration (t / temporal-quantity :quant 19
            :unit (y / year)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0508.12 ::date 2013-06-15T04:17:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (a / and
            :op1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "France"))

            :op5 (c5 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Britain"))
            :op3 (c8 / country :name (n9 / name :op1 "Germany")))
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (p2 / part)
            :op2 (t / technology))
      :ARG2 (a3 / aircraft :name (n6 / name :op1 "Advanced" :op2 "Light" :op3 "Helicopter")
            :ARG1-of (s / sell-01
                  :ARG0 (c6 / country :name (n7 / name :op1 "India")
                        :ARG0-of (p4 / plan-01
                              :ARG1 s))
                  :ARG2 (c7 / country :name (n8 / name :op1 "Myanmar")))))

                  :quant (m / much))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070716_0508.29 ::date 2013-06-15T06:54:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

(w / work-01
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Saferworld"))
      :ARG1 (p / prevent-01
            :ARG0 o
            :ARG1 (v / violence
                  :instrument-of (a / arm))))

                                                :mod (f / former)))))))))

  :ARG0 (s / source
          :mod (m / media))

          :ARG1 (p / person
                  :quant (a / at-least
                           :op1 121))
          :location (c2 / country

                              :op1 "Iran"))

                  :op1 (d / date-entity
                         :year 2007))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070726_0219.16 ::date 2013-06-18T04:20:18 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Greenpeace France stated that the French-Libyan nuclear reactor deal poses an enormous problem in terms of nuclear proliferation and branded the French-Libyan nuclear reactor deal as in keeping with the French policy of irresponsible export of nuclear technology.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070726_0219_16.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (s / state-01
            :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Greenpeace" :op2 "France"))
            :ARG1 (p / pose-02
                  :ARG0 (d / deal-01
                        :ARG0 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "France"))
                              :op2 (c3 / country :name (n7 / name :op1 "Libya")))
                        :ARG1 (r / reactor
                              :mod (n2 / nucleus)))
                  :ARG1 (p2 / problem
                        :mod (e / enormous))
                  :topic (p3 / proliferate-01
                        :ARG0 (t2 / thing
                              :mod n2))))
      :op2 (b / brand-01
            :ARG0 o
            :ARG1 d
            :ARG2 (c2 / conform-01
                  :ARG1 d
                  :ARG2 (p4 / policy
                        :mod (e2 / export-01
                              :ARG1 (t / technology
                                    :mod n2)
                              :ARG1-of (r2 / responsible-41 :polarity -))
                        :mod c))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070726_0219.17 ::date 2013-06-18T06:02:45 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Greenpeace pointed out that previous French Presidents had signed nuclear deals with the former Shah of Iran, with the former Iraqi dictator Saddam Hussein and with South Africa during the apartheid era.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070726_0219_17.txt
(p / point-02
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Greenpeace"))
      :ARG1 (s / sign-02
            :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "France"))
                        :ARG2 (p4 / president)
                        :time (p3 / previous)))
            :ARG1 (d / deal-01
                  :mod (n3 / nucleus))
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (s2 / shah
                        :mod (c2 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                        :mod (f / former))
                  :op2 (d2 / dictator :name (n6 / name :op1 "Saddam" :op2 "Hussein")
                        :mod (f2 / former)
                        :mod (c3 / country :name (n7 / name :op1 "Iraq")))
                  :op3 (c4 / country :name (n8 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Africa")))
            :time (e / era
                  :mod (a2 / apartheid))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070726_0219.26 ::date 2013-06-18T10:21:05 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Wed Sep 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070726_0219_26.txt

  :ARG0 (a / agree-01

                  :mod (b / bilateral))
          :time (d / date-entity
                  :year 2006
                  :month 3))

          :mod (r3 / research-01
                 :ARG1 (n / nucleus))
          :location (c3 / city
                      :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Tajura"))
          :poss (r / reactor
                  :mod (n5 / nucleus)
                  :ARG1-of (s / supply-01
                             :ARG0 (c4 / country
                                     :name (n4 / name
                                             :op1 "Soviet"
                                             :op2 "Union"))
                             :time (d2 / date-entity
                                     :year 1979))))
  :mod (p / primary))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070726_0219.31 ::date 2013-06-18T11:16:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt In 040000 weapons-grade uranium stored at the nuclear research centre in Tajura was removed under International Atomic Energy Agency scrutiny and was sent for recycling to Russia after Muammar Kadhafi pledged to give up weapons of mass destruction in 030000.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070726_0219_31.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (r / remove-01
            :ARG1 (u / uranium
                  :ARG1-of (s2 / store-01
                        :location (c / center
                              :mod (r4 / research-01
                                    :ARG1 (n2 / nucleus))
                              :location (c2 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Tajura"))))
                  :mod (w2 / weapons-grade))
            :prep-under (s / scrutinize-01
                  :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Atomic" :op3 "Energy" :op4 "Agency")))
            :time (d / date-entity :year 2004))
      :op2 (s3 / send-01
            :ARG1 u
            :ARG2 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Russia"))
            :purpose (r3 / recycle-01
                  :ARG1 u)
            :time (a2 / after
                  :op1 (p / pledge-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n5 / name :op1 "Muammar" :op2 "Kadhafi"))
                        :ARG2 (g2 / give-07
                              :ARG0 p2
                              :ARG1 (w3 / weapon
                                    :ARG2-of (d2 / destroy-01
                                          :degree (m / mass))))
                        :time (d3 / date-entity :year 2003)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070726_0219.32 ::date 2013-06-18T11:31:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

          :name (n2 / name

  :time (o / original))

# ::snt 2007-08-18

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078.2 ::date 2013-06-17T07:09:31 ::snt-type country ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Saudi Arabia (SA)
# ::save-date Mon Jun 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078_2.txt
(c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Saudi" :op2 "Arabia"))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078.3 ::date 2013-06-17T07:10:16 ::snt-type topic ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt International; Government; dissent; crime; politics
# ::save-date Tue Jun 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078_3.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (i / international)
      :op2 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))
      :op3 (d / dissent-01)
      :op4 (c / crime)
      :op5 (p / politics))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078.4 ::date 2013-06-17T07:12:31 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt More than 60 Saudi activists have signed a petition calling for the release of a group of reformists held in the ultra-conservative kingdom since early February 2007.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078_4.txt
(s / sign-01
      :ARG0 (a / activist
            :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Saudi" :op2 "Arabia"))
            :quant (m / more-than :op1 60))
      :ARG1 (p / petition-01
            :ARG0 a
            :ARG0-of (c3 / call-02
                  :ARG1 (r / release-01
                        :ARG1 (g / group
                              :consist-of (p2 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (r2 / reform-01)
                                    :ARG1-of (h / hold-01
                                          :location (k / kingdom
                                                :mod (c2 / conservative
                                                      :mod (u / ultra)))
                                          :time (s2 / since
                                                :op1 (e / early
                                                      :op1 (d / date-entity :year 2007 :month 2))))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078.5 ::date 2013-06-17T07:12:44 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The group is accused of funding terrorism.
# ::save-date Mon Jun 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078_5.txt
(a / accuse-01
      :ARG1 (g / group)
      :ARG2 (f / fund-01
            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 (t / terrorism)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078.6 ::date 2013-06-17T07:14:00 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt More than 60 Saudi activists have signed a petition calling for the release of a group of reformists held in the ultra-conservative kingdom since early February 2007.
# ::save-date Tue Jun 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078_6.txt
(s / sign-01
      :ARG0 (a / activist
            :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Saudi" :op2 "Arabia"))
            :quant (m / more-than :op1 60))
      :ARG1 (p / petition-01
            :ARG0 a
            :ARG1 (c2 / call-03
                  :ARG0 a
                  :ARG1 (r / release-01
                        :ARG1 (g / group
                              :consist-of (p2 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (r2 / reform-01)
                                    :ARG1-of (h / hold-01
                                          :location (k / kingdom
                                                :mod (c3 / conservative
                                                      :mod (u / ultra)))
                                          :time (s2 / since
                                                :op1 (e / early
                                                      :op1 (d / date-entity :year 2007 :month 2))))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078.7 ::date 2013-06-17T07:14:26 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The group is accused of funding terrorism.
# ::save-date Mon Jun 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078_7.txt
(a / accuse-01
      :ARG1 (g / group)
      :ARG2 (f / fund-01
            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 (t / terrorism)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078.8 ::date 2013-06-17T07:18:04 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The petition is a copy of which was obtained by AFP in Dubai.
# ::save-date Tue Jun 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078_8.txt
(c3 / copy-01
      :ARG1 (t / thing
            :ARG1-of (o / obtain-01
                  :ARG0 (o2 / organization :name (n / name :op1 "AFP"))
                  :location (c4 / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Dubai"))))
      :ARG2 (p2 / petition-01))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078.9 ::date 2013-06-17T07:23:18 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The petition was signed by 67 activists and sent to the Justice Ministry and advisory Shura Council in Riyadh and to 2 Government-sanctioned human rights watchdogs.
# ::save-date Tue Jun 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078_9.txt
(a2 / and
      :op1 (s / sign-01
            :ARG0 (a / activist :quant 67)
            :ARG1 (p / petition-01))
      :op2 (s2 / send-01
            :ARG1 p
            :ARG2 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (o2 / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Justice" :op2 "Ministry"))
                  :op2 (o / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Shura" :op2 "Council")
                        :ARG0-of (a4 / advise-01)
                        :location (c2 / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Riyadh")))
                  :op3 (w / watchdog :quant 2
                        :mod (r / right
                              :mod (h / human))
                        :ARG1-of (s3 / sanction-01
                              :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                                    :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078.10 ::date 2013-06-18T09:39:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The petition said the reformists had been held for longer than 6 months without a trial and that under Saudi law they should therefore be released.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078_10.txt
(s / say-01
  :ARG0 (p / petition-01)
  :ARG1 (a / and
          :op1 (h / hold-01
                 :ARG1 (p2 / person
                         :ARG0-of (r / reform-01))
                 :duration (m2 / more-than
                             :quant (t / temporal-quantity
                                      :quant 6
                                      :unit (m / month)))
                 :prep-without (t2 / trial))
          :op2 (r2 / recommend-01
                 :ARG1 (r3 / release-01
                         :ARG1 p2)
                 :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                            :ARG0 (l / law
                                    :mod (c / country
                                           :name (n / name
                                                   :op1 "Saudi"
                                                   :op2 "Arabia")))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078.11 ::date 2013-06-18T06:18:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Saudi Arabia is an absolute monarchy that has taken steps towards reform.
# ::save-date Tue Jun 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078_11.txt
(m / monarchy
      :ARG0-of (t / take-01
            :ARG1 (s / step-01
                  :ARG2 (r / reform-01
                        :ARG0 c2)))
      :mod (a / absolute)
      :domain (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Saudi" :op2 "Arabia")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078.12 ::date 2013-06-18T06:22:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt This includes holding male-only elections in 2005 to elect half of the members of municipal councils.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078_12.txt
(i / include-01
      :ARG1 (h / hold-04
            :ARG1 (e / elect-01
                  :ARG0 (m / male
                        :mod (o / only)))
            :time (d / date-entity :year 2005)
            :purpose (e2 / elect-01
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91
                              :ARG2 (p2 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG1 (c / council
                                                :mod (c2 / city))
                                          :ARG2 (m2 / member)))
                              :ARG3 "1/2"))))
      :ARG2 (t / this))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078.13 ::date 2013-06-18T06:29:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The petition stated the 7 reformists had been arrested in an undignified way and had been denied access to lawyers to be informed of the specific accusations of their detention.
# ::save-date Tue Jun 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078_13.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / petition)
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / arrest-01
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person :quant 7
                        :ARG0-of (r / reform-01))
                  :manner (d / dignify-01 :polarity -))
            :op2 (d2 / deny-01
                  :ARG1 (a3 / access-01
                        :ARG0 p2
                        :ARG1 (l / lawyer)
                        :purpose (i / inform-01
                              :ARG0 l
                              :ARG1 p2
                              :ARG2 (a4 / accusation
                                    :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                                          :ARG0 (d3 / detain-01
                                                :ARG1 p2))
                                    :mod (s2 / specific))))
                  :ARG2 p2)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078.14 ::date 2013-06-18T09:00:13 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The petition listed those being held as Issam basrawi, Saud al-Hashimi, Suleiman al-Rashudi, Sharif khalib, Musa al-Qarni, Abdul Rahman al-Shamiri and Abdul Aziz al-khariji.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078_14.txt
(l / list-01
      :ARG0 (p8 / petition-01)
      :ARG1 (p9 / person
            :ARG1-of (h / hold-01)
            :ARG2-of (i / include-91
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Issam" :op2 "Basrawi"))
                        :op2 (p2 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Saud" :op2 "al-Hashimi"))
                        :op3 (p3 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Suleiman" :op2 "al-Rashudi"))
                        :op4 (p4 / person :name (n4 / name :op1 "Sharif" :op2 "Khalib"))
                        :op5 (p5 / person :name (n5 / name :op1 "Musa" :op2 "al-Qarni"))
                        :op6 (p6 / person :name (n6 / name :op1 "Abdul" :op2 "Rahman" :op3 "al-Shamiri"))
                        :op7 (p7 / person :name (n7 / name :op1 "Abdul" :op2 "Aziz" :op3 "al-Khariji"))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078.15 ::date 2013-06-18T10:35:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The petition also said that the reformists should be compensated upon their release.
# ::save-date Tue Jun 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078_15.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (p / petition)
      :ARG1 (r / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (c / compensate-01
                  :ARG2 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (r2 / reform-01))
                  :time (r3 / release-01
                        :ARG1 p2)))
      :mod (a / also))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078.16 ::date 2013-06-18T09:16:58 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Writer Mohammed bin hudeijan al-Harbi told AFP in April 2007 that 3 of the reformists being held had signed a petition to King Abdullah calling for the establishment of an Islam-based constitutional monarchy.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078_16.txt
(t / tell-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Mohammed" :op2 "bin" :op3 "hudeijan" :op4 "al-Harbi")
            :ARG0-of (w / write-01))
      :ARG1 (s / sign-01
            :ARG0 (p4 / person :quant 3
                  :ARG0-of (r / reform-01)
                  :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                        :ARG2 (p5 / person
                              :ARG0-of (r2 / reform-01)
                              :ARG1-of (h / hold-01))))
            :ARG1 (p6 / petition-01
                  :ARG0 p5
                  :ARG1 (c2 / call-03
                        :ARG0 p5
                        :ARG1 (e / establish-01
                              :ARG1 (m / monarchy
                                    :mod (c3 / constitution)
                                    :ARG0-of (b / base-02
                                          :ARG2 (r3 / religious-group :name (n4 / name :op1 "Islam")))))
                        :ARG2 (k / king :name (n3 / name :op1 "King" :op2 "Abdullah")))))
      :ARG2 (p3 / publication :name (n2 / name :op1 "AFP"))
      :time (d / date-entity :month 4 :year 2007))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078.17 ::date 2013-06-18T06:13:12 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The petition demanded the introduction of a parliament elected by all adults - men and women in Saudi Arabia.
# ::save-date Tue Jun 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0078_17.txt
(d / demand-01
      :ARG0 (p / petition)
      :ARG1 (i / introduce-02
            :ARG1 (g / government-organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Parliament")
                  :ARG1-of (e / elect-01
                        :ARG0 (a / adult
                              :mod (a2 / all)
                              :example (a3 / and
                                    :op1 (m / man)
                                    :op2 (w / woman))
                              :location (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Saudi" :op2 "Arabia")))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297.3 ::date 2013-06-17T07:26:58 ::snt-type topic ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt International; terrorism; money; politics; crime
# ::save-date Mon Jun 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297_3.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (i / international)
      :op2 (t / terrorism)
      :op3 (m / money)
      :op4 (p / politics)
      :op5 (c / crime))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297.4 ::date 2013-06-17T07:28:16 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Interpol issues wanted notice for Saddam Hussein's daughter Raghad for suspicion of terrorism and inciting violence.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297_4.txt
(i / issue-01
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Interpol"))
      :ARG1 (n4 / notice
            :mod (w / want-01
                  :ARG1 (d / daughter :name (n2 / name :op1 "Raghad")
                        :poss (p3 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Saddam" :op2 "Hussein"))
                        :ARG2-of (s / suspect-01
                              :ARG1 (a / and
                                    :op1 (t / terrorism)
                                    :op2 (i2 / incite-01
                                          :ARG0 d
                                          :ARG1 (v / violence))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297.5 ::date 2013-06-18T02:55:45 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Raghad sought refuge in Jordan, where she is protected by King Abdullah II.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297_5.txt
(s / seek-01
      :ARG0 (p3 / person :name (n4 / name :op1 "Raghad"))
      :ARG1 (r / refuge)
      :ARG2 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Jordan")
            :location-of (p / protect-01
                  :ARG0 (k / king :name (n2 / name :op1 "Abdullah" :op2 "II"))
                  :ARG1 p3)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297.6 ::date 2013-06-18T03:09:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt On 18 August 2007 International Police Organization Interpol issued a red notice for Raghad Hussein on suspicion of terrorism.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297_6.txt
(i / issue-01
      :ARG0 (o3 / organization :name (n / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Police" :op3 "Organization"))
      :ARG1 (n4 / notice
            :mod (r / red)
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (s / suspect-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Raghad" :op2 "Hussein"))
                        :ARG2 (t / terrorism))))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 18 :month 8 :year 2007))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297.7 ::date 2013-06-18T02:23:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Interpol's red notice is not an international arrest warrant.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297_7.txt
(w / warrant :polarity -
      :topic (a / arrest-01
            :mod (i / international))
      :domain (n2 / notice
            :mod (r / red)
            :poss (o2 / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Interpol"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297.8 ::date 2013-06-25T07:03:23 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Interpol's red notice is a request for foreign police forces to cooperate in finding and extraditing Raghad to Iraq.
# ::save-date Tue Jun 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297_8.txt
(r / request-01
      :ARG0 (n3 / notice
            :mod (r2 / red)
            :poss (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Interpol")))
      :ARG1 (c2 / cooperate-01
            :ARG0 f
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (f3 / find-01
                        :ARG0 f
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person :name (n4 / name :op1 "Raghad")))
                  :op2 (e / extradite-01
                        :ARG0 f
                        :ARG1 p2
                        :ARG3 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iraq")))))
      :ARG2 (f / force
            :mod (p / police
                  :mod (f2 / foreign))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297.9 ::date 2013-06-17T07:28:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Raghad faces charges of terrorism in Iraq.
# ::save-date Tue Jun 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297_9.txt
(f / face-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Raghad"))
      :ARG1 (c2 / charge-05
            :ARG1 p2
            :ARG2 (t / terrorism)
            :location (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iraq"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297.10 ::date 2013-06-17T07:33:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Raghad Hussein is Saddam Hussein's eldest daughter.
# ::save-date Mon Jun 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297_10.txt
(d / daughter
      :mod (o / old
            :degree (m / most))
      :poss (p3 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Saddam" :op2 "Hussein"))
      :domain (p4 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Raghad" :op2 "Hussein")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297.11 ::date 2013-06-17T07:36:01 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Interpol posted the red notice on Interpol's website.
# ::save-date Mon Jun 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297_11.txt
(p / post-01
      :ARG0 (o3 / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Interpol"))
      :ARG1 (n3 / notice
            :mod (r / red))
      :ARG2 (w / website
            :poss o3))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297.12 ::date 2013-06-17T07:39:02 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Interpol's red notice stated that an Iraqi arrest warrant was issued accusing Raghad of terrorism and inciting crimes against life and health.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297_12.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (n3 / notice
            :mod (r / red)
            :poss (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Interpol")))
      :ARG1 (i / issue-01
            :ARG1 (w / warrant
                  :mod (a / arrest-01)
                  :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iraq"))
                  :ARG0-of (a2 / accuse-01
                        :ARG1 (p / person :name (n4 / name :op1 "Raghad"))
                        :ARG2 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (t / terrorism)
                              :op2 (i2 / incite-01
                                    :ARG0 p
                                    :ARG1 (c2 / crime
                                          :prep-against (a4 / and
                                                :op1 (l / life)
                                                :op2 (h / health)))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297.13 ::date 2013-06-18T03:21:45 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The red notice listed the name as Raghad Saddam Husayn al-Majid.
# ::save-date Tue Jun 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297_13.txt
(l / list-01
      :ARG0 (n2 / notice
            :mod (r / red))
      :ARG1 (n3 / name
            :prep-as (p2 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Raghad" :op2 "Saddam" :op3 "al-Majid" :op4 "Husayn"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297.14 ::date 2013-06-18T03:30:09 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The red notice stated that Raghad is believed to have both Iraqi and Jordanian nationality.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297_14.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (n4 / notice
            :mod (r / red))
      :ARG1 (b / believe-01
            :ARG1 (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Raghad"))
                  :ARG1 (n5 / nationality
                        :mod (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iraq"))
                        :mod (c4 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Jordan"))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297.15 ::date 2013-06-18T03:45:01 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Iraqi Interior Ministry operations director Major General Abdel Karim Khalaf stated that --
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297_15.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Abdel" :op2 "Karim" :op3 "Khalaf")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (g / government-organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Interior" :op2 "Ministry")
                        :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iraq")))
                  :ARG2 (d / director
                        :mod (o / operate-01)))
            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (m / major
                        :mod (g2 / general)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297.16 ::date 2013-06-18T03:52:02 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt A judicial order was issued against Raghad 1 year ago by the Central Criminal Court.
# ::save-date Tue Jun 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297_16.txt
(i / issue-01
      :ARG0 (o4 / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Central" :op2 "Criminal" :op3 "Court"))
      :ARG1 (o3 / order
            :mod (j / judicial))
      :ARG2 (a2 / against
            :op1 (p2 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Raghad")))
      :time (b / before
            :op1 (n / now)
            :quant (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                  :unit (y / year))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070818_0297.17 ::date 2013-06-17T07:39:42 ::snt-type body subordinate ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Raghad" :op2 "Hussein"))

                  :ARG2 (r / regime

      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iraq")))
            :mod (n3 / new))
      :ARG1 (p2 / prosecute-01
            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 (p3 / people
                  :ARG1-of (a / associate-01
                        :ARG2 (r / regime
                              :poss (p / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Saddam" :op2 "Hussein")))))
            :ARG2 (i / incite-01
                  :ARG0 p3
                  :ARG1 (v2 / violence)
                  :manner (a2 / allege-01))))

            :ARG1 (c / contact-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / people
                        :ARG0-of (k / know-01

                                    :poss (p / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Raghad")))))
                  :ARG1 (o5 / or
                        :op1 (p3 / police
                              :mod (l2 / local))
                        :op2 (h / headquarter
                              :poss o4)))))

                  :ARG1 a2)))

(a / accuse-01
      :ARG0 (a2 / and
            :op1 (p5 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Raghad"))

      :ARG1 (a3 / and
            :op1 (p7 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Saddam"))
            :op2 (p8 / person :name (n4 / name :op1 "Uday"))
            :op3 (p9 / person :name (n5 / name :op1 "Qusay")))
      :ARG2 (k / kill-01
            :ARG0 a3
            :ARG1 (m / man)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070820_0344.14 ::date 2013-06-15T08:34:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                              :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01

                              :ARG1 p2

                                    :ARG0 (i / incite-01
                                          :ARG0 p2

                                          :ARG1-of (a4 / allege-01)))))
                  :ARG1-of (a2 / associate-01
                        :ARG2 (r / regime
                              :mod (p3 / person :name (n4 / name :op1 "Saddam" :op2 "Hussein")))))
            :time (s2 / since
                  :op1 (y2 / year
                        :mod (l3 / last)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070904_0188.5 ::date 2013-06-15T10:40:06 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt On 070904 the Russian anti-drug agency stated that a large quantity of opium and other drugs worth approximately 1.7 million United States dollars was seized in a major operation in six former Soviet bloc countries last week.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070904_0188_5.txt

      :ARG0 (a / agency
            :mod (c5 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Russia"))
            :ARG0-of (c6 / counter-01
                  :ARG1 (d4 / drug)))
      :ARG1 (s2 / seize-01
            :ARG1 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (o / opium)
                  :op2 (d2 / drug
                        :mod (o2 / other))
                  :quant (q / quantity
                        :mod (l / large))
                  :ARG1-of (v / value-01
                        :ARG2 (a2 / approximately
                              :op1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 1700000
                                    :unit (d3 / dollar
                                          :mod (c3 / country :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))))))
            :location (c4 / country :quant 6
                  :part-of (b2 / bloc
                        :mod (f / former)
                        :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Soviet" :op2 "Union"))))
            :time (w / week
                  :mod (l2 / last))
            :subevent-of (o3 / operation
                  :mod (m2 / major)))
      :time (d / date-entity :month 7 :day 9 :year 2004))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070904_0188.6 ::date 2013-06-15T13:11:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The drug seizure was unprecedented in scope and involved the countries of the Collective Security Treaty Organisation.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070904_0188_6.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (p / precedent
         :polarity -
         :domain (s3 / scope
                   :poss (s / seize-01
                           :ARG1 (d / drug))))
  :op2 (i / involve-01
         :ARG1 (c / country
                 :poss (o / organization
                         :name (n2 / name
                                 :op1 "Collective"
                                 :op2 "Security"
                                 :op3 "Treaty"
                                 :op4 "Organisation")))
         :ARG2 s))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070904_0188.7 ::date 2013-06-15T13:44:15 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Collective Security Treaty Organisation countries involved in the drug seizure were Armenia, Belarus, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Russia and Tajikistan.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070904_0188_7.txt
(c / country
      :ARG1-of (i / involve-01
            :ARG2 (s / seize-01
                  :ARG1 (d / drug)))
      :poss (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Collective" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Treaty" :op4 "Organisation"))
      :domain (a / and
            :op1 (c6 / country :name (n7 / name :op1 "Armenia"))
            :op2 (c7 / country :name (n8 / name :op1 "Belarus"))
            :op3 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Kazakhstan"))
            :op4 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Kyrgyzstan"))
            :op5 (c4 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Russia"))
            :op6 (c5 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Tajikistan"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070904_0188.8 ::date 2013-06-15T13:54:12 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Russian anti-drug agency stated that the 9.7 metric tons of drugs seized included 191 kilograms of heroin, 226 kilograms of hashish, 4.3 metric tons of opium, 4.3 metric tons of marijuana, 11 kilograms of cocaine and 26 kilograms of synthetic drugs.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070904_0188_8.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (a / agency
            :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Russia"))
            :ARG0-of (c2 / counter-01
                  :ARG1 (d3 / drug)))
      :ARG1 (i2 / include-01
            :ARG1 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (h / heroin
                        :quant (m6 / mass-quantity :quant 191
                              :unit (k / kilogram)))
                  :op2 (h2 / hashish
                        :quant (m7 / mass-quantity :quant 226
                              :unit (k2 / kilogram)))
                  :op3 (o / opium
                        :quant (m8 / mass-quantity :quant 4.3
                              :unit (t2 / ton
                                    :mod (m3 / metric))))
                  :op4 (m4 / marijuana
                        :quant (m9 / mass-quantity :quant 4.3
                              :unit (t3 / ton
                                    :mod (m2 / metric))))
                  :op5 (c3 / cocaine
                        :quant (m10 / mass-quantity :quant 11
                              :unit (k3 / kilogram)))
                  :op6 (d / drug
                        :mod (s3 / synthetic)
                        :quant (m11 / mass-quantity :quant 26
                              :unit (k4 / kilogram))))
            :ARG2 (d2 / drug
                  :quant (m5 / mass-quantity :quant 9.7
                        :unit (t / ton
                              :mod (m / metric)))
                  :ARG1-of (s2 / seize-01))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070904_0188.9 ::date 2013-06-15T14:16:44 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :ARG1 (d / drug)))
      :ARG1 (p / participate-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
            :ARG1 (e / effort
                  :mod (j / joint)
                  :ARG0-of (o2 / oppose-01
                        :ARG1 (d2 / drug)))
            :ord (o3 / ordinal-entity :value 1)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070904_0188.10 ::date 2013-06-15T14:22:04 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :op1 (c3 / conduct-01

                        :ARG1 (d3 / drug)))
            :duration (d4 / date-interval
                  :op1 (d / date-entity :day 28 :month 8 :year 2007)
                  :op2 (d2 / date-entity :day 3 :month 9 :year 2007)))
      :op2 (i / involve-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Ukraine"))
                  :op2 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Poland")))
            :ARG2 o
            :mod (a3 / also)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070904_0188.11 ::date 2013-06-15T14:38:11 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                              :unit (k2 / kilogram)))))

                  :mod (s2 / south)
                  :location c2)))

                          :location c))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :day 5
          :month 9

          :dayperiod (m / morning)))

                        :mod (o2 / other)

                              :ARG1 (p4 / public)

                  :ARG1-of (a2 / aim-02
                        :ARG2 (i3 / improve-01
                              :ARG1 (s / security)
                              :location (s2 / society)))))
      :mod (r2 / recent))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070906_0523.6 ::date 2013-06-21T12:13:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :ARG2 (s2 / spokeswoman)))

            :op1 (g / ground-00 :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (s3 / state-01
                              :topic (a3 / attack-01
                                    :ARG0 (m2 / military
                                          :mod c)
                                    :ARG1 (n2 / network
                                          :poss (g3 / government-organization
                                                :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01)
                                                :mod (f / foreign)))
                                    :mod (c2 / cyber)))))
            :op2 (r / responsible :polarity -
                  :domain t)
            :op3 (r2 / result-01
                  :ARG1 (m / motive
                        :mod (u / ulterior))
                  :ARG2 t))
      :time (d / date-entity :month 6 :day 9 :year 2007))

                        :ARG0 (t2 / technology)
                        :ARG1 g)
                  :op2 (a4 / adept
                        :topic (h / hack-04
                              :ARG0 g)
                        :domain g))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070910_0544.14 ::date 2013-06-22T05:37:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Sep 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070910_0544_14.txt

      :ARG0 (r / report-01
            :ARG0 (p / press)

                  :time (r2 / recent)))

                        :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Germany"))
                        :ARG2 (o2 / official)))

                        :ARG2 (o3 / official)))
            :ARG0-of (s / state-01
                  :ARG1 (i / involve-01
                        :ARG1 (m / military
                              :mod (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "China")))
                        :ARG2 (a2 / attack-01
                              :ARG0 c4
                              :ARG1 (w2 / website
                                    :mod (g / government-organization
                                          :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                                :ARG1 a3)))
                              :mod (c6 / cyber))))
            :ARG1-of (n5 / name-01 :polarity -)))

# ::save-date Mon Jul 1, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20070921_0474_15.txt

      :op1 (t / test-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))))
            :ARG1 (f / fire-01
                  :ARG0 g
                  :ARG1 (m / missile
                        :ARG1-of (r / range-01
                              :ARG2 (l / long)))
                  :location (o / over
                        :op1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Japan")))))

            :ARG0 g

                  :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 c2)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 1998))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071001_0260.8 ::date 2013-06-22T11:08:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 20070900 the Indian spy agency the Research and Analysis Wing (RAW) warned the national markets watchdog that individuals or groups linked to al-Qaeda could be investing in the rising stock market.
# ::save-date Sun Jun 30, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071001_0260_8.txt
(w / warn-01
      :ARG0 (a / agency :name (n5 / name :op1 "Research" :op2 "and" :op3 "Analysis" :op4 "Wing")
            :mod (s / spy-01)
            :mod (c3 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "India")))

            :domain (i / invest-01
                  :ARG0 (o / or
                        :op1 (i2 / individual)
                        :op2 (g / group)
                        :ARG1-of (l / link-01
                              :ARG1 (c / criminal-organization :name (n / name :op1 "al-Qaeda"))))
                  :ARG2 (m2 / market

                  :mod (n7 / national)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071003_0237.15 ::date 2013-06-23T04:56:42 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

(i / inform-01
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Research" :op2 "and" :op3 "Analysis" :op4 "Wing"))
