# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248.4 ::date 2013-06-18T14:37:33 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Afghan authorities raided a drugs laboratory and a customs office on 6 October 2007.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 27, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248_4.txt
(r / raid-01
      :ARG0 (a / authority
            :mod (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))
      :ARG1 (a2 / and
            :op1 (l / laboratory
                  :mod (d2 / drug))
            :op2 (o / office
                  :mod (c / customs)))
      :time (d3 / date-entity :day 6 :month 10 :year 2007))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248.5 ::date 2013-06-18T14:39:13 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 4 tons of liquid heroin and 1 ton of hashish were seized.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 27, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248_5.txt
(s / seize-01
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (h / heroin
                  :quant (m / mass-quantity :quant 4
                        :unit (t3 / ton))
                  :mod (l / liquid))
            :op2 (h2 / hashish
                  :quant (m2 / mass-quantity :quant 1
                        :unit (t4 / ton)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248.6 ::date 2013-06-18T14:40:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Afghan authorities stated on 7 October 2007 that authorities had seized 4 tons of liquid heroin and 1 ton of hashish packed to look like a brand of instant yeast.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 27, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248_6.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (a / authority
            :mod (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))
      :ARG1 (s2 / seize-01
            :ARG0 a
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (h / heroin
                        :quant (m / mass-quantity :quant 4
                              :unit (t3 / ton))
                        :mod (l / liquid))
                  :op2 (h2 / hashish
                        :quant (m2 / mass-quantity :quant 1
                              :unit (t4 / ton)))
                  :ARG2-of (p / pack-01
                        :manner (l3 / look-02
                              :ARG0 a2
                              :ARG1 (b2 / brand-01
                                    :mod (y2 / yeast
                                          :mod (i2 / instant)))))))
      :time (d2 / date-entity :day 7 :month 10 :year 2007))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248.7 ::date 2013-06-18T14:50:50 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The finds were made separately near the border with Iran which is a main smuggling route for drugs from Afghanistan.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 27, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248_7.txt
(f2 / find-01
      :manner (s / separate-01)
      :location (n / near
            :op1 (b2 / border-01
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran")
                        :mod (r / route-01
                              :path-of (s3 / smuggle-01
                                    :ARG1 (d2 / drug)
                                    :ARG2 (c2 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))
                              :mod (m2 / main))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248.8 ::date 2013-06-18T19:12:51 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Deputy Interior Minister General Daud Daud told reporters in Kabul that the heroin was discovered on 6 October 2007 in the southwestern province of Farah when a drugs laboratory was raided.
# ::save-date Sat Sep 14, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248_8.txt
(t / tell-01
  :ARG0 (p3 / person
          :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Daud"
                  :op2 "Daud")
          :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                     :ARG2 (g / general))
          :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                     :ARG2 (m2 / minister
                             :mod (d4 / deputy)
                             :mod (i / interior))))
  :ARG1 (d2 / discover-01
          :ARG1 (h / heroin)
          :time (d3 / date-entity
                  :day 6
                  :month 10
                  :year 2007)
          :location (p / province
                      :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Farah")
                      :location (s / southwest))
          :time (r2 / raid-01
                  :ARG1 (l / laboratory
                          :mod (d / drug))))
  :ARG2 (t2 / tell-01
          :ARG2 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (r / report-01)))
  :location (c2 / city
              :name (n5 / name
                      :op1 "Kabul")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248.9 ::date 2013-06-18T19:20:19 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Daud stated that a total of 4030 kilograms (8866 pounds) of heroin and 1 ton of chemicals used to make the heroin were seized and the lab has been destroyed.
# ::save-date Fri Jun 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248_9.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Daud"))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (s2 / seize-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (h / heroin
                              :quant (m2 / mass-quantity :quant 4030
                                    :unit (k2 / kilogram)))
                        :op2 (c / chemical
                              :quant (m3 / mass-quantity :quant 1
                                    :unit (t3 / ton))
                              :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                                    :ARG2 (m / make-01
                                          :ARG1 h)))
                        :ARG2-of (t / total-01)))
            :op2 (d / destroy-01
                  :ARG1 (l / lab))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248.10 ::date 2013-06-18T19:26:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

          :quant 1
          :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                     :ARG2 (f2 / find-01
                             :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                                     :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))
                             :mod (b / big)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248.12 ::date 2013-06-18T19:32:12 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Daud stated that the men exported the drugs in liquid form as animal medicine to Iran.

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Daud"))

            :ARG0 (m / man)
            :ARG1 (d / drug
                  :manner (f / form
                        :mod (l / liquid)
                        :prep-as (m2 / medicine
                              :beneficiary (a / animal))))
            :ARG2 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248.13 ::date 2013-06-18T19:39:26 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :ARG1 (h / hashish)
            :location (o / office
                  :mod (c / customs)
                  :instrument-of (c6 / cross-02
                        :ARG1 (b2 / border-01
                              :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                              :ARG2 (c7 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Iran"))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248.14 ::date 2013-06-18T19:43:32 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (p2 / person
            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (o / official)))
      :ARG1 (c / container
            :purpose (s3 / ship-01)
            :ARG0-of (h / hold-01
                  :ARG1 (p / packet
                        :mod (y2 / yeast
                              :mod (i2 / instant)
                              :mod (b / brand :name (n / name :op1 "Hollandia")))
                        :quant (m2 / mass-quantity :quant 500
                              :unit (g2 / gram))
                        :quant (m / multiple :op1 100))))
      :ARG2 (j / journalist))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248.15 ::date 2013-06-19T07:21:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG0-of (w / wrap-01)))

      :ARG0-of (r2 / read-01
            :ARG3 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (g2 / gold
                        :mod (b3 / black))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248.16 ::date 2013-06-19T07:25:32 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The United Nations stated in an annual drugs survey released in August 2007 that Afghanistan's opium production in 2007 rose by approximately 1/3rd to 8200 tons annually.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248_16.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (o2 / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations"))
      :ARG1 (r2 / rise-01
            :ARG1 (p / produce-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                  :ARG1 (o / opium)
                  :time (d / date-entity :year 2007))
            :ARG2 (a / approximately :op1 "1/3")
            :ARG4 (r3 / rate-entity-91
                  :ARG1 (m / mass-quantity :quant 8200
                        :unit (t2 / ton))
                  :ARG2 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                        :unit (y2 / year))))
      :medium (s2 / survey-01
            :ARG2 (d3 / drug)
            :ARG1-of (r / release-01
                  :time (d4 / date-entity :month 8 :year 2007))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248.17 ::date 2013-06-19T07:32:48 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Afghanistan produces 93 percent of the world's opium used to make heroin.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248_17.txt
(i / include-91
      :ARG1 (o2 / opium
            :poss (w3 / world)
            :ARG1-of (u2 / use-01
                  :ARG2 (m2 / make-01
                        :ARG1 (h2 / heroin)))
            :ARG1-of (p / produce-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))))
      :ARG3 (p4 / percentage-entity :value 93))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248.18 ::date 2013-06-19T07:35:59 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The U.N. survey said most of the opium is converted to heroin within Afghanistan and the main markets for Afghanistan's opium include Europe and Central Asia.
# ::save-date Fri Jun 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248_18.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (s2 / survey-01
            :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "U.N.")))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (c4 / convert-01
                  :ARG1 (o2 / opium
                        :quant (m3 / most))
                  :ARG2 (h / heroin)
                  :location (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))
            :op1 (i / include-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (c3 / continent :name (n4 / name :op1 "Europe"))
                        :op2 (w / world-region :name (n5 / name :op1 "Central" :op2 "Asia")))
                  :ARG2 (m / market-01
                        :mod (m2 / main)
                        :prep-for (o3 / opium
                              :poss c)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248.19 ::date 2013-06-19T07:41:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The U.N. survey said the cultivation of cannabis which is used to make hashish increased from 50000 hectares (123500 acres) in 2006 to 70000 hectares in 2007.
# ::save-date Fri Jun 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071007_0248_19.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (s2 / survey-01
            :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "U.N.")))
      :ARG1 (i / increase-01
            :ARG1 (c / cultivate-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / cannabis
                        :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                              :ARG2 (m / make-01
                                    :ARG1 (h3 / hashish)))))
            :ARG3 (a5 / area-quantity :quant 50000
                  :unit (h4 / hectare)
                  :time (d3 / date-entity :year 2006))
            :ARG4 (a2 / area-quantity :quant 70000
                  :unit (h / hectare)
                  :time (d / date-entity :year 2007))))

(a / and
      :op1 (i / international)
      :op2 (w / weapon)
      :op3 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))

      :op5 (c / crime))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071008_0203.4 ::date 2013-06-19T12:26:11 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Tajik border police said on October 8, 2007 that the police had killed one smuggler, wounded another and seized 90 kilos (198 pounds) of opium after intercepting the smugglers as the pair tried to enter from Afghanistan.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071008_0203_4.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (p3 / police
            :location (b / border-01
                  :ARG1 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Tajikistan"))))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (k / kill-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / police-01)
                  :ARG1 (p / person :quant 1
                        :ARG0-of (s6 / smuggle-01)))
            :op2 (w2 / wound-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 (p5 / person
                        :ARG0-of (s7 / smuggle-01)
                        :mod (a4 / another)))
            :op3 (s3 / seize-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 (o / opium
                        :quant (m2 / mass-quantity :quant 90
                              :unit (k2 / kilogram)
                              :mod (m / mass-quantity :quant 198
                                    :unit (p4 / pound)))))
            :time (a3 / after
                  :mod (i / intercept-01
                        :ARG1 (p6 / person :quant 2
                              :ARG0-of (s8 / smuggle-01))
                        :time (t / try-01
                              :ARG0 p6
                              :ARG1 (e / enter-01
                                    :source (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))))))
      :time (d2 / date-entity :day 8 :month 10 :year 2007))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071008_0203.5 ::date 2013-06-19T12:33:33 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG0-of (s6 / smuggle-01)))

                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 (p5 / person
                        :ARG0-of (s7 / smuggle-01)
                        :mod (a4 / another)))

                        :ARG2 (o2 / officer)))
            :time (a3 / after
                  :op1 (t4 / tell-01
                        :ARG1 (s3 / surrender-01
                              :ARG0 s2)
                        :ARG2 s2)))
      :ARG2 (p2 / publication :name (n / name :op1 "AFP")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071008_0203.9 ::date 2013-06-19T14:24:45 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

(l / locate-01
      :ARG1 (v / village :name (n2 / name :op1 "Odinaboi")
            :location (m2 / mountain))
      :location (n / near
            :op1 (b2 / border
                  :location (r / relative-position
                        :op1 (c2 / capital :name (n5 / name :op1 "Dushanbe"))
                        :direction (s2 / southeast)
                        :quant (a / about
                              :op1 (d / distance-quantity :quant 230
                                    :unit (k / kilometer)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071008_0203.10 ::date 2013-06-19T14:30:27 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :location (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Tajikistan"))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071008_0203.14 ::date 2013-06-19T14:37:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Avaz yudlashev is from Tajikistan's anti-drug agency.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071008_0203_14.txt
(h / have-org-role-91
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Avaz" :op2 "Yudlashev"))
      :ARG1 (a / agency
            :ARG0-of (c / counter-01
                  :ARG1 (d / drug))
            :location (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Tajikistan"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071008_0203.15 ::date 2013-06-19T14:41:44 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 7 Afghan smugglers last month were sentenced to prison terms of between 17 and 20 years.
# ::save-date Fri Jun 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071008_0203_15.txt
(s / sentence-01
      :ARG1 (s2 / smuggle-01 :quant 7
            :mod (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))
      :ARG2 (t3 / term
            :mod (p2 / prison)
            :quant (b2 / between
                  :op1 (t4 / temporal-quantity :quant 17
                        :unit (y3 / year))
                  :op2 (t5 / temporal-quantity :quant 20
                        :unit (y4 / year))))
      :time (m / month
            :mod (l / last)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071008_0203.16 ::date 2013-06-19T14:43:57 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The sentence was punishment for smuggling a total of 335 kilos of drugs into the country in summer of last year.
# ::save-date Fri Jun 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071008_0203_16.txt
(p / punish-01
      :ARG2 (s2 / smuggle-01
            :ARG1 (d / drug
                  :mod (t2 / total-01
                        :ARG2 (m / mass-quantity :quant 335
                              :unit (k2 / kilogram))))
            :ARG3 (c / country)
            :season (d2 / date-entity
                  :part-of (y / year
                        :mod (l / last))
                  :season (s3 / summer)))
      :instrument (s / sentence-01))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071008_0203.17 ::date 2013-06-19T14:46:05 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt A recent UN report stated that Afghanistan produces 93 percent of the world's opium used to make heroin and Afghanistan's opium production increased by a third to 8200 tons annually in 2007.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071008_0203_17.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (r / report-01
            :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "UN"))
            :mod (r2 / recent))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (p2 / produce-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                  :ARG1 (o2 / opium
                        :mod (p5 / percentage-entity :value 93
                              :poss (w / world))
                        :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                              :ARG2 (m2 / make-01
                                    :ARG1 (h / heroin)))))
            :op2 (i / increase-01
                  :ARG1 (p3 / produce-01
                        :ARG1 o2
                        :location c)
                  :ARG2 "1/3"
                  :ARG4 (r3 / rate-entity-91
                        :ARG1 (m / mass-quantity :quant 8200
                              :unit (t / ton))
                        :ARG2 (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                              :unit (y / year)))
                  :time (d / date-entity :year 2007))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071008_0203.18 ::date 2013-06-19T16:04:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :op1 (h / heroin

                        :quant (m / mass-quantity :quant 4
                              :unit (t / ton)))
                  :op2 (h2 / hashish
                        :quant (m2 / mass-quantity :quant 1
                              :unit (t2 / ton)))
                  :ARG2-of (p2 / pack-01
                        :manner (l2 / look-02
                              :ARG0 a2
                              :ARG1 (b / brand-01
                                    :mod (y / yeast
                                          :mod (i / instant)))))))
      :time (d2 / date-entity :day 7 :month 10 :year 2007))

             :ARG2 (s2 / seize-01
                     :mod (l / large
                            :degree (m / most))

      :ARG0 (p2 / person

                                    :ARG2 (p3 / president)))))
            :op2 (d / disable-01
                  :ARG0 p2

            :instrument (h / hack-04)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071030_0116.6 ::date 2013-06-26T01:38:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :mod (c5 / cyber)
                  :instrument-of (r / retaliate-01)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2007 :month 10 :day 30))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071030_0116.10 ::date 2013-06-26T02:11:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                                          :ARG2 (p4 / president)))))
                  :time (d / date-entity :year 2007 :month 10 :day 28))
            :op2 (c / continue-01
                  :ARG1 a2
                  :time (o2 / onto
                        :op1 (d2 / date-entity :year 2007 :month 10 :day 30)))))

                  :mod (s2 / separate)

                        :ARG2 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (c3 / country :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Kingdom"))
                              :op2 (c4 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Israel"))

                              :part-of c)))))

            :ARG2-of (t2 / transit-01
                  :ARG1 (t / trade-01
                        :ARG1 (a / and
                              :op1 (o / opium)
                              :op2 (h / heroin))
                        :mod (i / international)))
            :mod (k / key)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071111_0386.10 ::date 2013-06-25T04:24:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

  :ARG1 (a / and
          :op1 (c / country
                 :name (n2 / name
                         :op1 "Afghanistan"))
          :op2 (c2 / country
                 :name (n3 / name
                         :op1 "Pakistan")))
  :ARG2 (p / province
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Sistan-Baluchestan")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071111_0386.13 ::date 2013-06-25T04:41:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

          :year 2007))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071111_0386.15 ::date 2013-06-25T04:52:55 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The number 254 was tabulated with an AFP count compiled from press and witness reports.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071111_0386_15.txt
(t / tabulate-01
  :ARG1 (x / 254)
  :instrument (c / compile-01
                :ARG1 (c2 / count-01
                        :ARG0 (p / publication
                                :name (n / name
                                        :op1 "AFP"))
                        :ARG1 (r / report-01
                                :ARG1 (a / and
                                        :op1 (p2 / press)
                                        :op2 (p3 / person
                                               :ARG0-of (w / witness-01)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071111_0386.16 ::date 2013-06-25T05:09:26 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Iran"))
  :ARG1 (e / execute-01)
  :time (m / month
          :mod (r / recent)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071111_0386.17 ::date 2013-06-25T05:13:01 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))

            :ARG0-of (a / aim-02
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (p / promote-02
                              :ARG1 (v / virtue))
                        :op2 (b / boost-01
                              :ARG1 (s / security))
                        :beneficiary (s2 / society)))))

          :mod (c / capital)

                      :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Iran"))))

                  :op1 (p2 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Shamseddin" :op2 "Darvakh" :op3 "Gorgich"))

            :quant-of (e / execute-01

            :ARG1 (c4 / count-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / publication :name (n3 / name :op1 "AFP")))
            :source (r / report-01
                  :ARG0 (p / press))))

                  :ARG2 (p2 / president)))

                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071127_0501.6 ::date 2013-06-26T00:43:38 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Nuclear company Areva of France announced on 26 November 2007 that Areva had agreed to deliver 2 third-generation nuclear reactors to China as part of a package of deals worth 8 billion euros (11.9 billion dollars).
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071127_0501_6.txt
(a / announce-01
      :ARG0 (c / company :name (n / name :op1 "Areva")
            :mod (n2 / nucleus)
            :location (c3 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "France")))
      :ARG1 (a2 / agree-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (d2 / deliver-01
                  :ARG1 (r / reactor :quant 2
                        :mod (n3 / nucleus)
                        :part-of (p / package
                              :consist-of (d3 / deal-01)
                              :ARG1-of (v / value-01
                                    :ARG2 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 8000000000
                                          :unit (e / euro))))
                        :mod (g / generation
                              :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 3)))
                  :ARG2 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "China"))))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2007 :month 11 :day 26))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071127_0501.7 ::date 2013-06-26T01:19:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Areva signed the reactors agreement with China Guangdong Nuclear Power Corporation (cgnpc) in a ceremony in Beijing attended by Sarkozy and Chinese President Hu Jintao.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071127_0501_7.txt
(s / sign-02
      :ARG0 (c / company :name (n / name :op1 "Areva"))
      :ARG1 (a / agree-01
            :ARG1 (r / reactor))
      :ARG2 (c2 / company :name (n2 / name :op1 "China" :op2 "Guangdong" :op3 "Nuclear" :op4 "Power" :op5 "Corporation"))
      :time (c3 / ceremony
            :ARG1-of (a4 / attend-01
                  :ARG0 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (p / person :name (n4 / name :op1 "Sarkozy"))
                        :op2 (p2 / person :name (n5 / name :op1 "Hu" :op2 "Jintao")
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (c5 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "China"))
                                    :ARG2 (p3 / president))))
                  :location (c4 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Beijing")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071127_0501.8 ::date 2013-06-26T01:56:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The agreement was reached after months of expectations that China would buy 2 European pressurized water reactors (EPRs) from Areva.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 22, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071127_0501_8.txt
(r / reach-01
      :ARG1 (a / agree-01)
      :time (a2 / after
            :op1 (e / expect-01
                  :ARG1 (b / buy-01
                        :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "China"))
                        :ARG1 (r2 / reactor :quant 2
                              :mod (p / pressurize-01
                                    :ARG1 (w / water))
                              :mod (c2 / continent :name (n2 / name :op1 "Europe")))
                        :ARG2 (c3 / company :name (n3 / name :op1 "Areva")))
                  :duration (m / multiple
                        :op1 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                              :unit (m3 / month))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071127_0501.9 ::date 2013-06-26T02:16:38 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (c / company :name (n / name :op1 "Areva"))

                  :mod (n2 / nucleus)
                  :mod (g / generation
                        :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 3)))

                        :ARG1 (e / equipment)
                        :ARG4 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "China"))
                        :instrument (v / venture
                              :mod (j / joint)))))
      :mod (a2 / also))

                  :mod (o2 / other))

                  :ARG0 f)))

                                    :ARG0 g

                  :op2 "Angel"
                  :op3 "Moratinos")
          :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                     :ARG1 (c / country
                             :name (n2 / name
                                     :op1 "Spain"))
                     :ARG2 (m / minister
                             :mod (f / foreign))))
  :ARG1 (d / desire-01
          :ARG0 (p / party
                  :quant (a / all)
                  :ARG2-of (i / include-91
                             :ARG1 (c2 / country
                                     :name (n3 / name
                                             :op1 "Russia"))))
          :ARG1 (r / reach-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (a2 / agree-01
                          :ARG1 (i2 / issue))))
  :time (w / week
          :mod (l / last)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0251.19 ::date 2013-06-22T12:04:45 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Conventional Forces in Europe Treaty was signed on November 19, 1990 in Paris by the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) and the Warsaw Pact.
# ::save-date Thu Jun 27, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0251_19.txt
(s / sign-01
      :ARG0 (a / and
            :op1 (m / military
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "North"
                        :op2 "Atlantic"
                        :op3 "Treaty"
                        :op4 "Organization"))
            :op2 (m2 / military
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Warsaw"
                        :op2 "Pact")))
      :ARG1 (t / treaty
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Conventional"
                  :op2 "Forces"
                  :op3 "in"
                  :op4 "Europe"
                  :op5 "Treaty"))
      :time (d / date-entity
            :year 1990
            :month 11
            :day 19)
      :location (c / city
            :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "Paris")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0251.20 ::date 2013-06-22T12:15:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt NATO and Warsaw Pact nations were the 2 opposing blocs during the Cold War.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0251_20.txt
(b / bloc :quant 2
      :ARG0-of (o / oppose-01)
      :time (d / during
            :op1 (w / war :name (n5 / name :op1 "Cold" :op2 "War")))
      :domain (a / and
            :op1 (n / nation
                  :poss (m / military :name (n2 / name :op1 "NATO")))
            :op1 (n3 / nation
                  :poss (m2 / military :name (n4 / name :op1 "Warsaw" :op2 "Pact")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0251.21 ::date 2013-06-22T12:34:59 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu Jun 27, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0251_21.txt
(a / amend-01
      :ARG1 (t / treaty)
      :time (d / date-entity :year 1999)
      :time (a2 / after
            :op1 (c / collapse-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Soviet" :op2 "Union")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0251.22 ::date 2013-06-22T12:42:22 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Russia ratified the updated treaty in 2004 but the United States and other NATO members have refused to do so arguing that Moscow must first fulfill obligations to withdraw forces from Georgia and from Moldova's separatist region of Trans-Dniester.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0251_22.txt
(h / have-concession-91
      :ARG1 (a4 / and
            :op1 (r2 / refuse-01
                  :ARG0 (a / and
                        :op1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
                        :op2 (c6 / country
                              :mod (o / other)
                              :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (m2 / military :name (n3 / name :op1 "NATO"))
                                    :ARG2 (m / member))))
                  :ARG1 (r4 / ratify-01
                        :ARG1 t2))
            :op2 (a2 / argue-01
                  :ARG0 a
                  :ARG1 (o2 / obligate-01
                        :ARG1 (c3 / city :name (n4 / name :op1 "Moscow"))
                        :ARG2 (f / fulfill-01
                              :ARG1 (o3 / obligate-01
                                    :ARG1 c3
                                    :ARG2 (w / withdraw-01
                                          :ARG1 (f2 / force)
                                          :ARG2 (a3 / and
                                                :op1 (c4 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Georgia"))
                                                :op2 (r3 / region :name (n6 / name :op1 "Trans-Dniester")
                                                      :mod (s2 / separatism)
                                                      :location (c5 / country :name (n7 / name :op1 "Moldova")))))
                                    :ord (o4 / ordinal-entity :value 1))))))
      :ARG2 (r / ratify-01
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Russia"))
            :ARG1 (t2 / treaty
                  :ARG1-of (u2 / update-01))
            :time (d / date-entity :year 2004)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0737.4 ::date 2013-07-14T10:33:54 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (c5 / conference

                  :ARG3 (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                        :unit (y / year))))

            :op1 (s / suspend-01

                        :poss (c3 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Russia")))
                  :ARG1 (p / participate-01
                        :ARG0 c3
                        :ARG1 (t / treaty :name (n2 / name :op1 "Conventional" :op2 "Forces" :op3 "in" :op4 "Europe" :op5 "Treaty"))))

                  :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Kazakhstan"))

                        :ARG0 c2

                              :ARG2 (c / chairman))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0737.6 ::date 2013-07-17T13:56:44 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :mod (m / major))

                 :degree (m / more))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0737.10 ::date 2013-06-27T14:29:32 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

  :domain (t / treaty
            :name (n / name
                    :op1 "Treaty"))

             :ARG1 (d / deploy-01
                     :ARG1 (a / and
                             :op1 (t2 / tank)
                             :op2 (a2 / aircraft)
                             :op3 (w / weapon
                                    :mod (o / other)))
                     :location (a3 / across
                                 :op1 (c / continent
                                        :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Europe"))))))

            :ARG2-of (r / respond-01

                                    :ARG1 (s3 / site
                                          :location-of (d2 / defend-01

                                          :op2 (c4 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Czech" :op2 "Republic")))))
                        :op2 (d / deploy-01
                              :ARG1 (a3 / and
                                    :op1 (f / force
                                          :mod c2)
                                    :op2 (f2 / force
                                          :mod (m2 / military :name (n6 / name :op1 "NATO"))
                                          :mod (o / other)))
                              :location (r2 / republic
                                    :mod (c6 / country :name (n7 / name :op1 "Soviet" :op2 "Union"))
                                    :location (c5 / continent :name (n8 / name :op1 "Europe"))

      :ARG1 (r / role

                  :mod (e / elect-01)
                  :ARG0-of (m / monitor-01)
                  :poss (o2 / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "OSCE")))
            :ARG1-of (f / follow-01
                  :ARG2 (d4 / decide-01
                        :ARG0 u
                        :ARG1 (b / boycott-01
                              :ARG0 u
                              :ARG1 (e3 / elect-01
                                    :ARG2 (g / government-organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "Parliament"))
                                    :location (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia"))
                                    :time (d2 / date-entity :day 2 :month 12 :year 2007)))
                        :time (e2 / early
                              :op1 (d / date-entity :month 11 :year 2007)
                              :degree (m2 / more))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0737.19 ::date 2013-07-15T03:13:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0737_19.txt
(d / defend-01
      :ARG0 (o2 / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Office" :op2 "for" :op3 "Democratic" :op4 "Institutions" :op5 "and" :op6 "Human" :op7 "Rights")
            :part-of (o4 / organization :name (n5 / name :op1 "OSCE")))
      :ARG1 (d2 / decide-01
            :ARG1 (b / boycott-01))
      :ARG2 (c2 / cite-01
            :ARG0 o2
            :ARG1 (d3 / delay-01
                  :ARG0 (a / authority
                        :mod (c / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Russia")))
                  :ARG1 (i / issue-01
                        :ARG0 a
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (v / visa)
                              :op2 (r / restrict-01
                                    :ARG1-of (w / warrant-01 :polarity -))
                              :ARG1-of (i2 / impose-01
                                    :ARG2 (m / mission
                                          :mod (o5 / observation)
                                          :poss o4)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0737.20 ::date 2013-07-15T03:25:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Putin"))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (c / cancel-01
                  :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "OSCE"))
                  :ARG1 (m / monitor-01
                        :ARG1 (v / vote-01)
                        :ARG1-of (p2 / plan-01
                              :ARG0 o))
                  :ARG1-of (r / recommend-01
                        :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "State" :op2 "Department")
                              :mod (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "U.S.")))))
            :op2 (a2 / aim-01
                  :ARG1 (d2 / discredit-01
                        :ARG1 (e / elect-01))))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 26 :month 11 :year 2007))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0737.21 ::date 2013-06-30T14:38:00 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Russia has denied obstructing the observers and has stated the elections will conform with Russian law.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0737_21.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (d / deny-01
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Russia"))
            :ARG1 (o / obstruct-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (o2 / observe-01))))
      :op2 (s / state-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (e / elect-01
                  :ARG1-of (c2 / conform-01
                        :ARG2 (l / law
                              :mod c)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0737.22 ::date 2013-07-15T13:37:55 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

(e / expect-01
      :ARG1 (d2 / discuss-01
            :ARG0 (c4 / conference)

                  :mod (m / major)
                  :topic (b / bid-01
                        :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Kazakhstan"))

                              :ARG1 (h / have-org-role-91

                                    :ARG1-of (r / rotate-01))
                              :time (d / date-entity :year 2009))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071128_0737.24 ::date 2013-07-15T15:34:24 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Kazakhstan"))))
      :ARG1 (h / have-org-role-91

            :ARG2 (c2 / chairman))

            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (s / situation
                        :mod (p2 / politics)
                        :mod (s2 / stable))
                  :op2 (p / policy
                        :mod (m / multilateral)
                        :mod (f / foreign))
                  :op3 (e / economy
                        :mod (s3 / strong))

                        :ARG2 (o / other
                              :op1 (c4 / country
                                    :mod (f2 / former)
                                    :part-of (c5 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Soviet" :op2 "Union"))))))))

                              :unit (d2 / day))))))

      :ARG2 (j / just :polarity -)
      :concession (r / refrain-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (a / apologize-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / atrocity))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071204_0145.6 ::date 2013-07-01T13:19:01 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt On 04 December 2007 on day 2 of a state visit to Algeria by French President Nicolas Sarkozy the Governments of France and Algeria signed billions of dollars of oil and gas deals and a nuclear accord.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071204_0145_6.txt
(s / sign-02
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 c))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (d3 / deal
                        :mod (o / oil))
                  :op2 (d4 / deal
                        :mod (g5 / gas))
                  :quant (m2 / multiple
                        :op1 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 1000000000
                              :unit (d5 / dollar))))
            :op2 (a3 / accord
                  :mod (n5 / nucleus)))
      :ARG2 (g3 / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Algeria"))))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 4 :month 12 :year 2007
            :mod (d6 / day
                  :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity :value 2)
                  :time-of (v / visit-01
                        :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Nicolas" :op2 "Sarkozy")
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "France"))
                                    :ARG2 (p2 / president)))
                        :ARG1 c3
                        :mod (s2 / state)))))

                                          :ARG1 c)

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071204_0145.8 ::date 2013-07-01T15:52:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                              :mod (r / rich)))
                  :mod (e / economic)
                  :mod (n2 / new)))
      :op2 (u / underscore-01
            :ARG0 p2

                  :ARG1 (b / between
                        :op1 (c / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "France"))
                        :op2 (c2 / colony
                              :mod (c3 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Algeria"))
                              :mod (f / former)
                              :poss c))
                  :mod (h / history)))
      :time (t2 / tour))

                                 :mod (n3 / nucleus)))

                         :name (n2 / name
                                 :op1 "Libya")))
         :time (d / date-entity
                 :year 2007
                 :month 12
                 :day 19))
  :op2 (a2 / announce-01
         :ARG0 c
         :ARG1 (v / visit-01
                 :ARG0 (p2 / person
                         :name (n4 / name
                                 :op1 "Sergei"
                                 :op2 "Lavrov")
                         :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG2 (m / minister
                                            :mod (f / foreign))))
                 :ARG1 c2
                 :time (w / weekend
                         :mod (t / this)))))

      :op3 (r / raise-01
            :ARG0 c3

                  :mod (d / diplomatic))
            :ARG2 (l3 / level
                  :poss (a4 / ambassador))))

# ::save-date Mon Jul 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071219_0023_28.txt

      :ARG0 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Russia"))
      :ARG1 (d2 / deliver-01
            :ARG0 c3
            :ARG1 (f / fuel
                  :mod (n4 / nucleus))
            :ARG2 (s2 / station
                  :mod (p / power
                        :mod (a / atom))
                  :mod (c4 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                  :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1)))
      :time (d3 / date-entity :year 2007 :month 12 :day 17))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071219_0023.29 ::date 2013-06-30T22:31:51 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Teheran defied international pressure by announcing plans to produce more fuel for its nuclear program.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071219_0023_29.txt
(d / defy-01
      :ARG0 (c / city :name (n / name :op1 "Teheran"))
      :ARG1 (p / pressure-01
            :ARG1 c
            :mod (i / international))
      :instrument (a / announce-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (p2 / plan-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (p3 / produce-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 (f / fuel
                              :quant (m / more))
                        :ARG3 (p4 / program
                              :mod (n2 / nucleus)
                              :poss c)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20071219_0023.30 ::date 2013-06-30T22:35:55 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (a / announce-01
            :ARG0 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Russia"))
            :ARG1 (s / send-01
                  :ARG1 (f / fuel)
                  :ARG2 (s2 / station :name (n4 / name :op1 "Bushehr")
                        :mod (p / power)
                        :mod (f2 / finish-01 :polarity -))))
      :ARG1 (p2 / progress-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / ambition
                  :mod (n5 / nucleus)
                  :mod (c4 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Iran")))))

                  :topic (m2 / make-01
                        :ARG1 (b / bomb))
                  :mod (s / secret))))

                                                    :mod (f / foreign))))
                         :ARG1 c2

                                 :mod (t / this))))))

(a / and
      :op1 (a2 / announce-01
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
            :ARG1 (n2 / normalize-01
                  :ARG1 (t / tie-01)
                  :mod (f / full))
            :time (d / date-entity :year 2006))
      :op2 (l / lift-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Libya")
                  :mod (g / government-organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "State" :op2 "Department")))
            :ARG3 (t3 / thing
                  :ARG2-of (l2 / list-01
                        :ARG1 (s / state
                              :ARG0-of (s2 / sponsor-01
                                    :ARG1 (t2 / terrorism))))))
      :time (r / raise-01
            :ARG2 (r2 / relation
                  :mod (d2 / diplomacy))
            :ARG4 (l3 / level
                  :mod (a3 / ambassador))))

            :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Vietnam")))

            :ARG2 (d / die-01))

            :ARG1 (p3 / person :quant 18)
            :ARG2 (l / live-01
                  :location (p / prison))
            :ARG3 (t2 / traffic-00
                  :ARG1 (h2 / heroin)
                  :ARG3 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Vietnam")))))

# ::snt alternative energy sources were needed to generate electricity and desalinate water in Jordan.

(n2 / need-01
      :ARG1 (s / source
            :mod (e / energy
                  :mod (a / alternative)))
      :purpose (a2 / and
            :op1 (g / generate-01
                  :ARG1 (e2 / electricity))
            :op2 (d / desalinate-01
                  :ARG1 (w / water)
                  :location (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Jordan")))))

# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_CNA_ENG_20070304_0025_4.txt

      :ARG1 (b / budget
            :mod (m / military
                  :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "China")))
            :ARG0-of (l / lead-03
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :quant (s / some))
                  :ARG2 (b2 / believe-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (a / attempt-01
                              :ARG0 c
                              :ARG1 (a2 / achieve-01
                                    :ARG0 c
                                    :ARG1 (d / dominate-01
                                          :ARG0 c
                                          :ARG1 (g2 / globe)))))))
      :time (y / year
            :mod (r / recent)))

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20070304_0025.5 ::date 2013-08-11T11:57:02 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Mainland Affairs Council Chairman and Taiwan's top China policy planner Joseph Wu stated on March 4, 2007 that China's substantial military budget increase of 17.8 percent reveals an attempt at achieving global dominance.
# ::save-date Sun Sep 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_CNA_ENG_20070304_0025_5.txt

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Joseph" :op2 "Wu")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Mainland" :op2 "Affairs" :op3 "Council"))
                  :ARG2 (c / chairman))
            :ARG0-of (p2 / plan-01
                  :ARG1 (p3 / policy
                        :mod (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "China")))
                  :ARG3 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Taiwan"))
                  :mod (t / top)))
      :ARG1 (r / reveal-01
            :ARG0 (i / increase-01
                  :ARG1 (b / budget
                        :mod (m / military)
                        :mod (s2 / substantial)
                        :mod c2)
                  :ARG2 (p4 / percentage-entity :value 17.8))
            :ARG1 (a / attempt-01
                  :ARG0 c2
                  :ARG1 (a2 / achieve-01
                        :ARG0 c2
                        :ARG1 (d2 / dominate-01
                              :ARG0 c2
                              :ARG1 (g / globe)))))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 4 :month 3 :year 2007))

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20070304_0025.7 ::date 2013-08-11T14:14:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Joseph Wu stated that China is attempting to achieve global dominance because the significant budget increase, the lack of transparency in military buildup, the rapid expansion of air and naval forces, and progress in space defense technology suggests an attempt at global dominance.
# ::save-date Sat Aug 31, 2013 ::file PROXY_CNA_ENG_20070304_0025_7.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Joseph" :op2 "Wu"))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / attempt-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))
                  :ARG1 (a3 / achieve-01
                        :ARG1 (d / dominate-01
                              :ARG0 c
                              :ARG1 (g / globe))
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                              :ARG0 (a4 / and
                                    :op1 (i / increase-01
                                          :ARG1 (b / budget
                                                :mod (s2 / significant)))
                                    :op2 (l / lack-01
                                          :ARG1 (t / transparency
                                                :mod (b2 / buildup
                                                      :mod (m / military))))
                                    :op3 (e / expand-01
                                          :ARG1 (a5 / and
                                                :op1 (m2 / military :name (n3 / name :op1 "Air" :op2 "Force"))
                                                :op1 (m3 / military :name (n4 / name :op1 "Navy" :op2 "Force")))
                                          :manner (r / rapid))))))
            :op2 (s3 / suggest-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / progress-01
                        :ARG1 (t2 / technology
                              :instrument-of (d2 / defend-01
                                    :medium (s4 / space))))
                  :ARG1 (a6 / attempt-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 (d3 / dominate-01
                              :ARG0 c
                              :ARG1 g)))))

                              :ARG1 p2))))

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20070304_0025.13 ::date 2013-08-11T17:26:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (s2 / system :quant 3
                                    :mod (w / weapon)
                                    :mod (e / expensive))
                              :op2 (s3 / submarine :quant 8
                                    :mod (d2 / diesel-electric))
                              :op3 (b / battery :quant 6 :name (n3 / name :op1 "Patriot" :op2 "PAC" :op3 "III")
                                    :ARG0-of (c2 / counter-01
                                          :ARG1 (m / missile)))
                              :op4 (a3 / aircraft :name (n4 / name :op1 "P-3" :op2 "C")
                                    :quant (s4 / squadron :op1 12)
                                    :ARG0-of (c3 / counter-01
                                          :ARG1 (s5 / submarine))))))
            :ARG2 (s6 / strengthen-01
                  :ARG1 (c4 / capable-41
                        :ARG1 c
                        :ARG2 (d / defend-01))
                  :ARG1-of (c5 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (b2 / buildup
                              :mod (m2 / military)
                              :mod (c6 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "China")))))))

                              :ARG2 (s3 / satellite
                                    :poss c)))))

      :time (a / after
            :op1 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 12
                  :unit (d2 / day)
                  :mod (s4 / silent))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070124_0098.12 ::date 2013-07-26T14:13:05 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Chinese test shot destroyed an overage weather satellite 537 miles above Earth and was detected by U.S. monitors January 11, 2007.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070124_0098_12.txt
(a2 / and
      :op1 (d3 / destroy-01
            :ARG0 (s / shot
                  :mod (t / test)
                  :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "China")))
            :ARG1 (s2 / satellite
                  :mod (w / weather)
                  :mod (o / overage)
                  :location (r / relative-position
                        :op1 (a / above
                              :mod (p / planet :name (n2 / name :op1 "Earth")))
                        :quant (d / distance-quantity :quant 537
                              :unit (m / mile)))))
      :op2 (d4 / detect-01
            :ARG0 (m2 / monitor
                  :mod (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "U.S.")))
            :ARG1 s
            :time (d2 / date-entity :day 11 :month 1 :year 2007)))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070124_0098.13 ::date 2013-07-26T14:15:58 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Jul 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070124_0098_13.txt
(r / refuse-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "China"))))
      :ARG1 (d / discuss-01
            :ARG1 (i / it)))

            :location (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070124_0098.15 ::date 2013-07-26T14:17:27 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (a / and
            :op1 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG2 (o / official)))
            :op2 (p3 / person
                  :ARG0-of (a2 / analyze-01)))
      :ARG1 (i2 / it)
      :ARG2 (s / signal-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / satellite
                  :mod (m / military)
                  :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "U.S."))
                  :mod (p / possible
                        :domain (v / vulnerable
                              :prep-to (a3 / attack-01
                                    :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))
                                    :ARG1 s2))))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070124_0098.16 ::date 2013-07-26T14:19:38 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt China's ability to shoot down satellites could pose an added threat in the event of hostilities over Taiwan because the U.S. military relies on satellites for reconnaissance, navigation, weapons guidance systems and anti-missile defenses.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070124_0098_16.txt

      :domain (t2 / threaten-01
            :ARG0 (c6 / capable-41
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "China"))
                  :ARG2 (s / shoot-05
                        :ARG1 (s2 / satellite)))
            :ARG1-of (a2 / add-02))
      :time (e / event
            :mod (h / hostility
                  :mod (o / over
                        :mod (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Taiwan")))))
      :ARG1-of (c4 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (r / rely-01
                  :ARG0 (m / military
                        :mod (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "U.S.")))
                  :ARG1 (s3 / satellite)
                  :ARG2 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (r2 / reconnaissance)
                        :op2 (n4 / navigate-01)
                        :op3 (s4 / system
                              :ARG0-of (g / guide-01
                                    :ARG1 (w / weapon)))
                        :op4 (d / defense
                              :ARG0-of (c5 / counter-01
                                    :ARG1 (m2 / missile)))))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070124_0098.28 ::date 2013-07-26T16:18:22 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (p3 / prevent-01
                        :ARG1 (r / race
                              :mod (a2 / arm)
                              :location (s / space))))
            :mod (f / frequent)))

      :op1 (r2 / repeat-01

                  :ARG1 (a2 / appear-01
                        :ARG1 (c3 / contradiction))
                  :ARG2 p))
      :op2 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (p3 / promote-02
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (d / deweaponize-00)
                        :op2 (u / use-01
                              :ARG1 (s2 / space
                                    :mod (o / outer))
                              :mod (p4 / peaceful)))
                  :mod (f / further))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070124_0098.30 ::date 2013-07-26T16:34:04 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070124_0098_30.txt
(a4 / and
  :op1 (a / advocate-01
         :ARG0 (c / country
                 :name (n / name
                         :op1 "China"))
         :ARG1 (d / develop-02
                 :ARG1 (s / space)
                 :mod (p / peaceful))
         :location (o / organization
                     :name (n2 / name
                             :op1 "United"
                             :op2 "Nations"))
         :mod (c2 / consistent))
  :op2 (p2 / push-02
         :ARG0 c
         :ARG1 (a2 / agree-01
                 :ARG1 (p3 / prevent-01
                         :ARG1 (b / become-01
                                 :ARG1 c
                                 :ARG2 (t / theater
                                         :prep-for (r / race
                                                     :mod (a3 / arm)
                                                     :mod (n3 / new)))))
                 :mod (i / international))))

            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (n3 / need-01 :polarity -
                  :ARG1 c3)))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070124_0098.32 ::date 2013-07-26T16:43:24 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG1 (k / keep-01

                                                            :mod (c3 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "U.S.")))))))))))

                                            :location (o / outside

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070207_0122.5 ::date 2013-07-30T10:07:10 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt A lawyer and a prominent dissident said that at least seven of the men were Saudi democracy activists whose arrest was a government attempt to abort their civic rights work.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 3, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070207_0122_5.txt
(s / say-01
  :ARG0 (a2 / and
          :op1 (l / lawyer)
          :op2 (p / person
                 :ARG0-of (d / dissent-01)
                 :mod (p2 / prominence)))
  :ARG1 (a3 / activist
          :mod (d2 / democracy)
          :mod (c2 / country
                 :name (n2 / name
                         :op1 "Saudi"
                         :op2 "Arabia"))
          :domain (m / man
                    :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                               :ARG2 (m2 / man))
                    :quant (a / at-least
                             :op1 7))
          :ARG1-of (a4 / arrest-01
                     :purpose (a5 / attempt-01
                                :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))
                                :ARG1 (a6 / abort-01
                                        :ARG0 g
                                        :ARG1 (w / work-01
                                                :ARG0 m
                                                :ARG1 (r / right
                                                        :mod (c / civic))))))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070207_0122.6 ::date 2013-07-30T10:15:49 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The interior ministry said Saudi police have arrested 10 men and accused them of collecting donations to fund terrorist acts outside the Kingdom.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 3, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070207_0122_6.txt
(s / say-01
  :ARG0 (g2 / government-organization
          :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "Interior"
                  :op2 "Ministry"))
  :ARG1 (a / and
          :op1 (a2 / arrest-01
                 :ARG0 (p / police
                         :mod (c2 / country
                                :name (n4 / name
                                        :op1 "Saudi"
                                        :op2 "Arabia")))
                 :ARG1 (m / man
                         :quant 10))
          :op2 (a3 / accuse-01
                 :ARG0 p
                 :ARG1 m
                 :ARG2 (c3 / collect-01
                         :ARG0 m
                         :ARG1 (t / thing
                                 :ARG1-of (d / donate-01))
                         :purpose (f / fund-01
                                    :ARG1 (a4 / act-02
                                            :mod (t2 / terrorist))
                                    :location (o / outside
                                                :op1 c2))))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070207_0122.10 ::date 2013-07-30T12:51:31 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (p2 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Al-Faleh"))
      :ARG3 (c / call-03
            :ARG0 p2
            :ARG1 (d3 / democracy
                  :mod (m / more)
                  :location (k / kingdom)))
      :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2004))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070207_0122.11 ::date 2013-07-30T12:57:11 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The men had planned to present authorities with a list of more than 40 prisoners without legal representation whom they intended to defend.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 3, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070207_0122_11.txt
(p / plan-01
  :ARG0 (m2 / man)
  :ARG1 (p2 / present-01
          :ARG0 m2
          :ARG1 (l / list
                  :consist-of (p3 / person
                                :quant (m3 / more-than
                                         :op1 40)
                                :ARG1-of (r / represent-01
                                           :polarity -
                                           :mod (l2 / law))
                                :ARG0-of (d / defend-01
                                           :ARG1-of (i / intend-01
                                                      :ARG0 m2))
                                :ARG0-of (i2 / imprison-01)))
          :ARG2 (a / authority)))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070207_0122.13 ::date 2013-07-30T14:43:23 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :ARG1 (r / right)

                  :ARG1-of (p / plan-01
                        :ARG0 (a3 / authority))))
      :mod (t / this))

                 :dayperiod (n2 / night)

                 :op1 l

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070207_0122.31 ::date 2013-08-02T01:50:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Faleh did not know why they were not allowed lawyers or charged publicly or shown proof or evidence if they are guilty of the crime.

  :ARG0 (p2 / person
          :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Faleh"))

          :ARG0-of (c / cause-01
                     :ARG1 (a / and
                             :op1 (a2 / allow-01
                                    :ARG1 (l / lawyer)
                                    :polarity -
                                    :beneficiary (t2 / they))
                             :op2 (c2 / charge-05
                                    :ARG1 t2
                                    :polarity -
                                    :manner (p / public))
                             :op3 (s / show-01
                                    :ARG1 (o / or
                                            :op1 (p3 / proof)
                                            :op2 (t3 / thing
                                                   :ARG0-of (e / evidence-01)))
                                    :ARG2 t2
                                    :polarity -)))
          :condition (g / guilty-41
                       :ARG1 t2
                       :ARG2 (c3 / crime)))
  :polarity -)

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070207_0122.32 ::date 2013-08-01T01:16:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The arrests were the first to target democracy activists since reform-minded King Abdullah took the throne in 2005 and pardoned Faleh and two other leading activists who had spent 18 months in prison.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 3, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070207_0122_32.txt
(a / arrest-01
  :ARG0-of (t / target-01
             :ARG1 (a2 / activist
                     :mod (d / democracy))
             :time (s / since
                     :op1 (t2 / take-01
                            :ARG0 (k / king
                                    :name (n / name
                                            :op1 "Abdullah")
                                    :mod (m2 / mind
                                           :mod (r / reform-01)))
                            :ARG1 (t4 / throne)
                            :time (d2 / date-entity
                                    :year 2005))
                     :op2 (p2 / pardon-01
                            :ARG0 k
                            :ARG1 (a3 / and
                                    :op1 (p3 / person
                                           :name (n2 / name
                                                   :op1 "Faleh"))
                                    :op2 (a4 / activist
                                           :quant 2
                                           :mod (o2 / other)
                                           :ARG0-of (l / lead-01)
                                           :ARG0-of (s2 / spend-02
                                                      :ARG1 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                                                              :quant 18
                                                              :unit (m / month))
                                                      :location (p4 / prison)))))))
  :ord (o / ordinal-entity
         :value 1))

          :quant 12
          :mod (o / other)

                          :quant (m / many)

                                     :ARG0 (f2 / force
                                             :mod (m2 / military)
                                             :mod (c / country
                                                    :name (n / name
                                                            :op1 "United"

                                     :ARG2 (a2 / and
                                             :op1 (n3 / navigate-01)
                                             :op2 (g / guide-01
                                                    :ARG1 (w / weapon))))))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070609_0091.16 ::date 2013-07-30T09:59:11 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (k / kill-01)

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20070930_0021.7 ::date 2013-08-01T07:06:24 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (c / country

                  :ARG1 (t / treaty :name (n4 / name :op1 "Non-Proliferation" :op2 "Treaty")
                        :mod (n5 / nucleus))))
      :ARG2 (p2 / participate-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (t2 / trade-01
                  :mod n5
                  :mod (i2 / international)
                  :ARG2-of (i3 / include-01
                        :ARG1 (p3 / purchase-01
                              :ARG1 (o / or
                                    :op1 (r / reactor)
                                    :op2 (f / fuel
                                          :mod (u / uranium))
                                    :op3 (y / yellowcake)))))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20070618_0031.5 ::date 2013-08-08T08:23:06 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Assistant Secretary of State Christopher Hill stated on 18 June 2007 that the North Korean government may be prepared to begin shutting down a plutonium producing reactor in June 2007 as the first step toward disabling the Unit by December 2007.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20070618_0031_5.txt
(s3 / state-01
      :ARG0 (p5 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Christopher" :op2 "Hill")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (s4 / secretary
                        :mod (s5 / state))
                  :ARG3 (a2 / assist-01
                        :ARG0 p5)))
      :ARG1 (p6 / possible
            :domain (p2 / prepare-02
                  :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))))
                  :ARG2 (b / begin-01
                        :ARG0 g
                        :ARG1 (s / shut-05
                              :ARG0 g
                              :ARG1 (r / reactor
                                    :ARG0-of (p3 / produce-01
                                          :ARG1 (p4 / plutonium)))
                              :prep-as (s2 / step-01
                                    :ARG2 (d / disable-01
                                          :ARG0 g
                                          :ARG1 r
                                          :time (b2 / by
                                                :op1 (d3 / date-entity :month 12 :year 2007)))
                                    :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1)))
                        :time (d2 / date-entity :month 6 :year 2007))))
      :time (d4 / date-entity :day 18 :month 6 :year 2007))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20070618_0031.10 ::date 2013-08-09T06:11:04 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                                  :op1 "Pyongyang"))

                          :mod (d3 / date-entity
                                 :day 24
                                 :month 6

                             :ARG0 t

                                     :mod (v2 / verify-01
                                            :ARG0 (p / person
                                                    :ARG0-of (i / inspect-01))
                                            :ARG1 (s2 / shut-05)))))

                  :day 18

              :name (n2 / name
                      :op1 "Vienna")
              :location (c2 / country
                          :name (n3 / name
                                  :op1 "Austria"))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20070618_0031.12 ::date 2013-08-09T07:14:49 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (p2 / person

                  :ARG2 (o / official)))

            :ARG0 p2

                  :ARG1 (b / begin-01
                        :ARG1 (d3 / decommission-01
                              :ARG1 (r3 / reactor :name (n4 / name :op1 "Yongbyon"))))
                  :time (d / date-entity :month 2 :year 2007)))
      :time (u / until
            :op1 (t / transfer-01
                  :ARG1 (f2 / fund
                        :ARG1-of (v / value-01
                              :ARG2 (m / monetary-quantity :quant 25000000
                                    :unit (d2 / dollar)))
                        :location (a2 / account
                              :ARG1-of (l / link-01
                                    :ARG1 c))
                        :ARG1-of (h / hold-01
                              :location (b2 / bank
                                    :mod (c2 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Macao")))))
                  :ARG2 c)))

          :op2 (a3 / allow-01
                 :ARG0 p3

                                :ARG1 s)

                                :ARG0 p2
                                :ARG1 s)))

                     :ARG3 (s3 / ship-01

                                              :quant 50000
                                              :unit (t / ton))))))

                :ARG1-of (r / reach-01
                           :time (d / date-entity
                                   :month 2

         :ARG0 p3
         :ARG1 (f / facility
                 :quant (a3 / all)))

             :ARG0 p3
             :ARG3 (o2 / oil
                     :mod (f2 / fuel)
                     :quant (m / mass-quantity
                              :quant 950000
                              :unit (t / ton)
                              :mod (f3 / further))))

          :mod (n3 / next)
          :part-of (a4 / agreement)))

# ::save-date Mon Sep 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20070828_0223_7.txt
(m / mean-01
  :ARG0 (p / plan)
  :ARG1 (a / allay-01
          :ARG0 p
          :ARG1 (s / suspect-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / activity
                          :mod (n / nucleus)
                          :poss (c / country
                                  :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Iran"))
                          :time (p2 / past)))))

                  :mod (n4 / nucleus)
                  :poss (c3 / country
                          :name (n5 / name
                                  :op1 "Iran")))
          :ARG2 (m / make-01

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20070828_0223.17 ::date 2013-08-27T07:03:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :name (n / name
                                :op1 "West")))
          :op2 (p2 / person
                 :ARG1-of (e / expert-41
                            :ARG2 (c / control-01
                                    :ARG1 (a2 / arm)))
                 :ARG0-of (l / lead-01))
          :quant (s2 / several))
  :ARG1 (a3 / attempt-01
          :ARG0 (c2 / country
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "Iran"))
          :ARG1 (a4 / avoid-01
                  :ARG0 c2
                  :ARG1 (p / punish-01
                          :ARG0 (o / organization
                                  :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "U.N."
                                          :op2 "Security"
                                          :op3 "Council"))
                          :ARG1 c2
                          :degree (f / further)))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274.4 ::date 2013-08-05T00:32:07 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt A list from the Nuclear Suppliers Group shows that Iran has been denied purchases of nuclear-related materials approximately 75 times since 1998 because of suspicions the purchases could have been used for building bombs.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274_4.txt
(s / show-01
      :ARG0 (l / list
            :source (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Nuclear" :op2 "Suppliers" :op3 "Group")))
      :ARG1 (d / deny-01
            :ARG1 (p / purchase-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (m / material
                        :ARG1-of (r / relate-01
                              :ARG2 (n3 / nucleus))))
            :ARG2 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
            :time (s2 / since
                  :op1 (d2 / date-entity :year 1998))
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (s3 / suspect-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / possible
                              :domain (u / use-01
                                    :ARG1 p
                                    :ARG2 (b / build-01
                                          :ARG1 (b2 / bomb))))))
            :frequency (a / approximately :op1 75)))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274.5 ::date 2013-08-05T00:33:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
