                                          :ARG1 (b2 / bomb))))))
            :frequency (a / approximately :op1 75)))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274.6 ::date 2013-08-05T00:33:48 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The 45-nation Nuclear Suppliers Group is an offshoot of the Nuclear Nonproliferation Treaty and is charged with monitoring international trade to ensure that nuclear technology transferred for peaceful purposes is not directed to military use.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274_6.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (o / offshoot
         :domain (o2 / organization
                   :name (n / name
                           :op1 "Nuclear"
                           :op2 "Suppliers"
                           :op3 "Group")
                   :ARG1-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG0 (n2 / nation
                                      :quant 45)))
         :part-of (t / treaty
                    :name (n3 / name
                            :op1 "Nuclear"
                            :op2 "Nonproliferation"
                            :op3 "Treaty")))
  :op2 (c / charge-05
         :ARG1 o2
         :ARG2 (m / monitor-01
                 :ARG0 o2
                 :ARG1 (t2 / trade-01
                         :mod (i / international))
                 :purpose (e / ensure-01
                            :ARG0 o2
                            :ARG1 (d / direct-01
                                    :ARG1 (t3 / technology
                                            :mod (n4 / nucleus)
                                            :ARG1-of (t4 / transfer-01
                                                       :purpose (p / purpose
                                                                  :mod (p2 / peaceful))))
                                    :ARG2 (u / use-01
                                            :mod (m2 / military))
                                    :polarity -)))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274.7 ::date 2013-08-05T00:34:06 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

  :ARG1 (o / organization
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Nuclear"
                  :op2 "Suppliers"
                  :op3 "Group"))
  :ARG2 (c2 / country
          :ARG1-of (a / advance-01
                     :manner (t / technology))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274.8 ::date 2013-08-05T00:34:21 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt According to the Nuclear Suppliers Group's mission statement countries act on an individual basis to block trades that violate export controls devised to maintain international cooperation on peaceful uses of nuclear energy.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274_8.txt
(s / say-01
  :ARG0 (s2 / statement
          :mod (m / mission)
          :poss (o / organization
                  :name (n / name
                          :op1 "Nuclear"
                          :op2 "Suppliers"
                          :op3 "Group")))
  :ARG1 (a / act-02
          :ARG0 (c / country)
          :manner (b / basis
                    :mod (i / individual))
          :purpose (b2 / block-01
                     :ARG0 c
                     :ARG1 (t / trade-01
                             :ARG0-of (v / violate-01
                                        :ARG1 (c2 / control-01
                                                :ARG1 (e / export-01)
                                                :ARG1-of (d / devise-01
                                                           :ARG2 (m2 / maintain-01
                                                                   :ARG0 c2
                                                                   :ARG1 (c3 / cooperate-01
                                                                           :ARG2 (u / use-01
                                                                                   :ARG1 (e2 / energy
                                                                                           :mod (n2 / nucleus))
                                                                                   :mod (p / peaceful))
                                                                           :mod (i2 / international))))))))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274.9 ::date 2013-08-05T00:51:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Nuclear Suppliers Group has no enforcement power beyond notifying companies of violating the group's guidelines.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274_9.txt
(h / have-03
  :ARG0 (g2 / group
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Nuclear"
                  :op2 "Suppliers"
                  :op3 "Group"))
  :ARG1 (p / power
          :mod (e / enforce-01)
          :mod (b / beyond
                 :op1 (n2 / notify-01
                        :ARG0 g2
                        :ARG1 (c / company)
                        :ARG2 (v / violate-01
                                :ARG0 c
                                :ARG1 (g / guideline
                                        :poss g2)))))
  :polarity -)

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274.10 ::date 2013-08-05T00:52:01 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :op1 (k / keep-02
            :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Nuclear" :op2 "Suppliers" :op3 "Group"))
            :ARG1 (p / private
                  :domain (d / data)))
      :op2 (m / meet-03
            :ARG0 o
            :degree (l / large)
            :manner (s / secret)))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274.11 ::date 2013-08-05T01:05:44 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Tue Sep 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274_11.txt
(a / and
  :op1 (b / be-temporally-at-91
         :ARG1 (d / deny-01
                 :ARG1 (p / purchase-01)
                 :quant (m / most)
                 :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                            :ARG2 (d2 / deny-01)))
         :ARG2 (s / since
                 :op1 (d3 / date-entity
                        :year 2002)))
  :op2 (r / result-01
         :ARG1 (i2 / intervene-01
                 :ARG0 (c / country
                         :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (o2 / organization
                                            :name (n2 / name
                                                    :op1 "Nuclear"
                                                    :op2 "Suppliers"
                                                    :op3 "Group"))
                                    :ARG2 (m2 / member))))
         :ARG2 d))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274.12 ::date 2013-08-05T01:35:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The list of trade denials was made available by a diplomat from a country interested in exposing the extent of Iranian efforts to acquire so-called dual-use items that can be converted to weapons production.

      :ARG0 (p3 / person
            :source (c / country
                  :ARG1-of (i / interest-01
                        :ARG2 (e / expose-01
                              :ARG0 c
                              :ARG1 (e2 / extent
                                    :poss (e3 / effort
                                          :mod (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))
                                          :purpose (a2 / acquire-01
                                                :ARG0 c2
                                                :ARG1 (i2 / item
                                                      :ARG1-of (c4 / call-01
                                                            :ARG2 (i3 / item)
                                                            :mod (s / so))
                                                      :ARG1-of (u / use-01

                                                      :ARG1-of (c3 / convert-01

                                                                  :ARG1 (w / weapon))
                                                            :mod (p2 / possible)))))))))
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (d2 / diplomat)))
      :ARG1 (a / available
            :domain (l / list
                  :consist-of (d / deny-01
                        :ARG1 (t / trade-01)))))

                              :source-of p)))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274.14 ::date 2013-08-05T02:40:10 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The list names companies from Australia, Finland, Sweden, the United Arab Emirates and Iran that were prevented from carrying out deals because the items being sold were suspected of being militarily useful.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274_14.txt
(n / name-01
  :ARG0 (l / list)
  :ARG1 (a2 / and
          :op1 (c / company
                 :source (c2 / country
                           :name (n2 / name
                                   :op1 "Australia")))
          :op2 (c9 / company
                 :source (c3 / country
                           :name (n3 / name
                                   :op1 "Finland")))
          :op3 (c10 / company
                 :source (c8 / country
                           :name (n6 / name
                                   :op1 "Sweden")))
          :op4 (c11 / company
                 :source (c4 / country
                           :name (n4 / name
                                   :op1 "United"
                                   :op2 "Arab"
                                   :op3 "Emirates")))
          :op5 (c12 / company
                 :source (c5 / country
                           :name (n5 / name
                                   :op1 "Iran")))
          :ARG1-of (p / prevent-01
                     :ARG2 (c6 / carry-03
                             :ARG0 a2
                             :ARG1 (d / deal-01))
                     :ARG1-of (c7 / cause-01
                                :ARG0 (s / suspect-01
                                        :ARG1 (u / useful
                                                :manner (m / military)
                                                :domain i)
                                        :ARG2 (i / item
                                                :mod (s2 / sell-01)))))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274.15 ::date 2013-08-05T02:41:00 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The listed items being offered for sale in the blocked deals included Nickel powder, petrochemical plant components, compressors, furnaces, steel flanges and fittings, electron microscopes, radiometric ore-sorting machines, valves and tubing, lasers, a rotary drilling rig, a mass spectrometer and a nitrogen production plant.

(i / include-01
  :ARG1 (a / and
          :op1 (p / powder
                 :consist-of (n2 / nickel))
          :op2 (c / component
                 :mod (p2 / plant
                        :mod (p3 / petrochemical)))
          :op3 (c2 / compressor)
          :op4 (f / furnace)

                 :op1 (f2 / flange
                        :consist-of (s2 / steel))
                 :op2 (f3 / fitting
                        :consist-of s2))
          :op6 (m / microscope
                 :mod (e / electron))
          :op7 (m2 / machine
                 :ARG0-of (s3 / sort-01
                            :ARG1 (o2 / ore))
                 :mod (r / radiometric))
          :op8 (a3 / and
                 :op1 (v / valve)
                 :op2 (t / tubing))
          :op9 (l2 / laser)
          :op10 (r2 / rig
                  :ARG0-of (d2 / drill-01)
                  :mod (r3 / rotary))
          :op11 (s4 / spectrometer
                  :mod (m3 / mass))
          :op12 (p4 / plant
                  :ARG0-of (p5 / produce-01
                             :ARG1 (n / nitrogen))))
  :ARG2 (i2 / item
          :ARG1-of (l / list-01)
          :ARG1-of (o / offer-01
                     :purpose (s / sell-01
                                :ARG1 i2
                                :subevent-of (d / deal-01
                                               :ARG1-of (b / block-01))))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274.16 ::date 2013-08-05T02:41:55 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Iranian end users included the Government of Iran and Iran's Atomic Energy Organization, power companies, engineering, petrochemical and oil-refining and gas companies, aircraft industries, schools, universities, engine manufacturers, mineral research centers, a helicopter support company and a plasma physics center.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274_16.txt
(i / include-01
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (g / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 c2))
                  :op2 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Atomic" :op2 "Energy" :op3 "Organization")
                        :poss c2))
            :op2 (c3 / company
                  :mod (p / power))
            :op3 (c / company
                  :mod (e2 / engineer-01))
            :op4 (c4 / company
                  :mod (p2 / petrochemical)
                  :ARG0-of (r / refine-01
                        :ARG1 (o2 / oil)))
            :op5 (c8 / company
                  :mod (g3 / gas))
            :op6 (i2 / industry
                  :mod (a4 / aircraft))
            :op7 (s / school)
            :op8 (u2 / university)
            :op9 (c9 / company
                  :ARG0-of (m / manufacture-01
                        :ARG1 (e3 / engine)))
            :op10 (c5 / center
                  :mod (r2 / research-01
                        :ARG1 (m2 / mineral)))
            :op11 (c6 / company
                  :ARG0-of (s2 / support-01
                        :topic (h / helicopter)))
            :op12 (c7 / center
                  :mod (p3 / physics
                        :mod (p4 / plasma))))
      :ARG2 (o3 / organization
            :ARG0-of (u / use-01
                  :mod (e / end))
            :mod (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274.17 ::date 2013-08-05T02:42:05 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                     :ARG2 (d / diplomat)))

                  :quant 75)

                          :quant 7

                                     :ARG2 (s3 / state
                                             :quant 45
                                             :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                                        :ARG2 (m / member))))))
          :mod (o / only)))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274.18 ::date 2013-08-05T02:53:37 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The diplomat stated the actual number of denials of sales of dual-use products to Iran is probably much higher than 75.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274_18.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (p3 / person
          :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                     :ARG2 (d / diplomat)))
  :ARG1 (p / probable
          :domain (h / high
                    :compared-to 75
                    :degree (m2 / more
                              :degree (m / much))
                    :domain (n / number
                              :mod (a / actual)
                              :quant-of (d2 / deny-01
                                          :ARG1 (s2 / sell-01
                                                  :ARG1 (p2 / product
                                                          :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                                                                     :manner (d4 / dual)))
                                                  :ARG2 (c / country
                                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                                  :op1 "Iran"))))))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274.19 ::date 2013-08-05T02:53:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Western diplomats stated that the government in Tehran uses front companies to receive and convert technology to weapons production without being detected as the standoff with Iran over Iran's nuclear program has continued.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274_19.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (p3 / person
          :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                     :ARG2 (d / diplomat))
          :mod (w / world-region
                 :name (n / name
                         :op1 "West")))
  :ARG1 (u / use-01
          :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01)
                  :location (c / city
                              :name (n2 / name
                                      :op1 "Tehran")))
          :ARG1 (c2 / company
                  :mod (f / front))
          :purpose (a / and
                     :op1 (r / receive-01
                            :ARG0 g
                            :ARG1 t)
                     :op2 (c3 / convert-01
                            :ARG0 g
                            :ARG1 (t / technology)
                            :ARG2 (p / produce-01
                                    :ARG1 (w2 / weapon))))
          :manner (d2 / detect-01
                    :polarity -)
          :ARG1-of (c4 / cause-01
                     :ARG0 (c5 / continue-01
                             :ARG1 (s2 / standoff
                                     :prep-with (c6 / country
                                                  :name (n3 / name
                                                          :op1 "Iran")))
                             :topic (p2 / program
                                      :mod (n4 / nucleus)
                                      :poss c6)))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274.20 ::date 2013-08-05T02:54:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Iran is a signatory to the Nuclear Nonproliferation Treaty but not a member of the Nuclear Suppliers Group.
# ::save-date Fri Aug 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20071115_0274_20.txt
(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (s / sign-02
            :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))
            :ARG1 (t / treaty :name (n2 / name :op1 "Nuclear" :op2 "Nonproliferation" :op3 "Treaty")))
      :ARG2 (h / have-org-role-91 :polarity -
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Nuclear" :op2 "Suppliers" :op3 "Group"))
            :ARG2 (m / member)))
